The Mecha Update was a major update for Team Fortress 2 released on December 20th, 2012.

The update was announced on December 19, 2012. It announced the addition of the final class in Mann vs. Machine, the Mecha-Engineer, as well as the map Bigrock. It further included the comic Shadow Boxers, and announced the addition of the Rescue Ranger, Loose Cannon, and the Vaccinator, new weapons for the Engineer, Demoman and Medic, respectively. Finally, the update announced the return of Nice and Naughty Winter Crates.

name: Teddy Floppy Ear
summary: A race game from Poland built using unity for mac and pc.

name: TetriPlus
summary:
Re-imagination of the classic block game! With new parts and special effects.
The classic experience it is also available.

name: Tetsuman
summary: Tetsuman is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Chat Noir and published by Kaga Tech, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Text Twist Pro
summary: Text Twist Pro is the iPhone version of the popular flash game. Players must unscramble a jumble of seven letters to form enough words to progress to the next level; it retails for one dollar.

name: TerTD
summary: TerTD is a mix of tower defense and real-time strategy. The player can build various types of towers and choose your favorite upgrades. Defeat the enemy and get the victory!

name: Tetrachroma
summary: Tetrachroma expands the tetromino stacking action of classic puzzle games with a new color changing mechanic inspired by Reversi. Stack blocks and change colors in a wide variety of modes.

name: Team of Bravery
summary: Team of Bravery is an action roguelike dungeon crawler Team RPG adventure game.Gather your team ,Level up your Team members and Exploring dangerous Dungeons.Survirve and Loot legendary Items and Treasure ~Fight your way out in the Greatest Adventure!

name: Team Fortress 2: The Sniper vs. Spy Update
summary:
The Sniper vs. Spy Update was the first two-class patch and the fifth major content pack released for Team Fortress 2.

Initially at the center of the update was the Sniper class, and the day by day progress went smoothly. An announcement on Day 4 revealed that the Spy would also benefit from the update. Each class was given three new weapons along with achievements.

name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame - Final Stage
summary: A puzzle-solving stage involving objects crafting and inventory use

name: Team Fortress 2: 119th Update
summary: The 119th Update was a major update released on April 29, 2010 Patch. The update was released in order to celebrate a notable milestone; the release of 119 Team Fortress 2 patches.

name: Tetrocombat
summary: Tetrocombat is a sci-fi, falling block, roguelike. Select your hexmaster and battle the mighty protojinz by combining falling "tetroes" infused with powerful hexes into lines to deal damage. Upgrade your hexmaster with unique effects to radically enhance your strategy and defeat the protojinz.

name: Tennis In Hell
summary: Tennis In Hell - Top Down is a game about tennis where the player must hit all the balls towards the opponent while he is trying to do the same, the more balls the players miss, the less health points they will have.

name: Terre Scramble!
summary: Terre is a merchant doing business in the city, and in order to earn more money, she often ventures into the labyrinth. However, the labyrinth is fraught with danger...

name: Tequila Sunrise
summary: Tequila Sunrise is a romantic comedy dating sim where you play as Robert Finch, ex-football player and current club promoter for "Tequila Sunrise" the newest, and hopefully soon-to-be trendiest, nightclub in Manchester.

name: Tetris Bliss
summary: Are you ready to challenge the block fun and explore the wonderful world of Meitu? Come experience this addictive Tetris game eliminate blocks, collect gift boxes, and uncover the secrets of Meitu!

name: Teku
summary: Place hexagonal tiles to form islands across a selection of varied levels. Teku is a peaceful game where the goal is to achieve the highest possible score.

name: Tesla Wars
summary: Tesla Wars challenges the player to defend their base using electric shock attacks.

name: Teck Boxing 3D
summary: Knock these guys out for a shot at glory in this punch out thriller!

name: Textris
summary: A block-matching game where players must spell words from falling letters.

name: Team Umizoomi
summary: They're mini, they're mighty, and they're built for math! Now you can join Team Umizoomi, and go on a mighty math adventure! Take a ride in the Umicar with Milli, Geo and Bot to help them rescue seahorses, build a submarine, or repair a rocket so it can blast off! With you on their team, Team Umizoomi can do anything!

name: Tecmo World Cup '93
summary: Twenty-four teams from around the globe have come to participate in this soccer showcase. Pick one and match your skills against the computer in an exhibition match, take on a friend, or put it all on the line in the World Cup Tournament! The action never stops!

name: Terrors
summary: Terrors is an Adventure game, developed by Megas and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Terraguard
summary: Space shooter

name: Techno Cop
summary:
In the single-player side-scrolling game the player is a cop in a seedy futuristic urban city. Armed with a pistol, the player has to kill various thugs, before the timer runs out. While the game has several levels, the background in the game does not change often.

The other half of the game is a driving sequence, similar to other computer games such as Roadblasters.

Techno Cop was one of the first games made for the Mega Drive/Genesis from a third party developer and was part of an attempt by Razorsoft to test what sort of content would Sega allow on a game made for one of its systems.

name: Tenka no Goikenban: Mito Koumon
summary:
This is an adventure game based on a TV show about a retired governor and his retainers going around solving problems in Edo period Japan.
The game allowd players to assume the role of one of the retainers as they go around investigating the town. Occasionally this involves fights with corrupt officials, evil samurai and gangsters. There's also a female ghost that will drain the player character's life if it comes into contact with them.
The game is noted for its many instances of speech samples. It also has a considerable amount of text.

The game consists of seven stages. Players control Kaku-san (Kakunoshin), a jujutsu user, in the odd-numbered stages and Suke-san (Skesaburo), a katana user, in the even-numbered stages, and go around the action stages to collect evidence of evil deeds.
The use of certain items allows the player to switch to a ninja or a servant for a certain period of time. The ninja can go undercover and the servant can interview the townspeople. In every stage, there is evidence that can only be obtained by ninjas or servants, and they must take turns.
Each time evidence of wrongdoing is collected, the clue gauge rises, and when it reaches its maximum, the stage is cleared by presenting the evidence to their lord, Mitsukuni Tokugawa (Mitokomon), who is waiting for them at the inn.
If the time limit is exceeded without collecting all the evidence, the player is forced to proceed to the next stage, but the final stage cannot be completed until all the stages have been cleared.

name: Tennis Manager Mobile
summary: Tennis Manager is back for the 2023 season with an updated tennis world tour and new goals and achievements! Become the best tennis manager ever! Build your own tennis academy, find the next tennis super stars and make your team of pro players climb the worldwide ranking. A game inspired by Patrick Mouratoglou, coach of Serena Williams!

name: Tensen Nyannyan: Gekigyouban
summary:
Tensen Nyannyan: Gekigyouban is a adventure mahjong game in which the player controls a young girl that will advance through the adventure playing mahjong games against other characters that she will encounter during the journey,

To advance in the game the player should win the mahjong games. The gameplay is the usual in a mahjong game and the game uses a first person perspective for the adventure and for the mahjong part.

name: Telnet Shooting Collection
summary: Experience the iconic cutscenes and music that are synonymous with Telnet titles ( Gaiares, Granada, Psychic Storm, and Avenger), whenever you want! This collection includes convenient features like save/load anywhere, rewind, and other quality of life upgrades.

name: Tentaizu
summary: Tentaizu is a must have application for players who enjoy puzzle games. Tentaizu requires players to use logic and follow the clues provided to find the hidden 10 stars. It is useful to develop math sense on algebra, logical, analytical, and reasoning ability.

name: Terrors 2
summary: Terrors 2 is an Adventure game, developed by Megas and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Tetris
summary: Tetris is a canceled Multi Screen Game & Watch. The game was supposed to be based on the Tetris series.

name: Telusfax
summary:
Telusfax is a archaeo-game set in the teletext system of a British television station one day in a half-remembered 2003.

Browse the system to locate the names of the presenters of five different tv shows.

Explore over 50 pages of pseudo-2003 content.
Track down forgotten celebrities.
Get the most up-to-date news regarding the foot and mouth pandemic.
Get the latest football scores.
Read about the music of the day.

name: Tekken 7: Originals Edition
summary: This versions contains the full game with the 12 Tekken series original character packs, as well as the new frame data feature.

name: Temporal Temple
summary: Temporal Temple is an arcade-platformer-shooter where you kill things for a while.

name: Tens!
summary:
Combining sudoku-style number puzzles and block-dropping gameplay, the aim of Tens is simple: place dice on the board, make 'tens' in any row or column and clear the board to win.
Tens is a relaxing puzzle game which offers tons of gameplay styles for you to choose from.

name: Tesla Boy: Robot Time Traveller
summary:
Reach new dimensions as you play as Tesla Boy, a time traveling robot who must find his creator. Reach blazing speeds while on the ground or catch a jetpack and soar to the skies as you turbo boost through space to find hidden treasures.
Play against friends on this futurist adventure. A complete platformer with incredible landscapes to explore and stacks of explosive power ups that can boost you into a whole new dimension of fun!
Simple, yet addictive one button game play controls to bounce or fly over mysterious monsters and challenging traps. Collect new treasures that help you race through time to find your almighty creator.

name: Terrarium Builder
summary: Build as many terrariums as you like, enjoying lo-fi peaceful and relaxing music. Sculpt the terrain, choose plants and decorations, and finally take pictures to share with everyone.

name: Temple of Causality
summary: Embark on a transcendental journey in Temple of Causality, a captivating puzzle game that melds ancient wisdom with intricate mechanics. Push interconnected blocks and guide Azura through mystic environments, mastering the concept of causality to solve mind-bending puzzles

name: Terra Incognito - Antarctica 1911
summary: Survive all the odds and reach the South Pole before your competitors...

name: Tennis World Tour: Legends Edition
summary: Tennis World Tour is a complete and faithful simulation of the sport, and also includes a unique system for customizing your strategy during a match, reflecting the tactical, physical, and mental dimensions of tennis. Over 30 tennis stars are represented in the game, including Roger Federer, Gaël Monfils, Angélique Kerber, Garbiñe Muguruza, Caroline Wozniacki, Nick Kyrgios, Alexander Zverev, and John Isner.

name: Tess Elated
summary: Tess Elated is an addicting Logic Puzzle game where you face off against a series of powerful female professionals. Investigate the diverse cast to discover who or what is influencing their world. Cross the line, and become... Elated!

name: Terrorist Takedown 2: US Navy Seals
summary: Terrorist Takedown 2: US Navy Seals is an Action game, developed and published by City Interactive, which was released in 2008.

name: Test Subject Green
summary:
The second chapter in the test subject series with new developments afoot!

Test Subject Green is a puzzle-platform game. The game is the sequel to Test Subject Blue released on the same year. The gameplay is similar to its predecessor, except Xeno Industries is attacked by Doctor Nastidious, who manages to escape with the scientist's enzyme, Blue.

name: Tennis Tower
summary: A game made with the process of gamedev tennis

name: Tebb And The Chistorbes
summary: ¡Alguien le robo el rostro a todos! Juego de plataformas 2d lineal, muchos checkpoints, no necesitas googlear. Tebb se encuentra con la misión de encontrar los 100 chistorbes para recuperar el rostro de todo el mundo. Controles simples: Moverse, correr y saltar.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Sharp Edition
summary: With the Sharps Silver Edition, you can declare your allegiance to clan Sharp. Get two iconic cars: the Jaguar F-Type SVR Coupe and Audi R8 Spyder V10 RWS, as well as unique customization items.

name: Tennis Cup II
summary: This tennis simulation recreates all the rules of the sport, from tie-breaks to break points. The action is viewed from behind one of the players, also featuring a split-screen option. You can play singles and doubles matches over 1,3 or 5 sets. There are 4 different types of court - grass, quick, hard and clay. You can play single matches, practice using a ball machine which fires a succession of shots at you, or play a season made up of major tournaments such as the Grand Slam events, the Masters and the ATP Cup. Player abilities can be adjusted to suit different styles of play.

name: Terra Firma
summary: Play god and create your own world in this complex simulation. Plate tectonics, wind and water erosion and plant life all develop and interact to produce a world that is viewable from a single tree to kilometres across.

name: Tetra Offline
summary:
Tetra Offline is an open-source version of the game Tetra Online. Tetra Offline is a singleplayer block-stacker game made in Unity. Tetra Offline was made available as Tetra Online, which originally released on Steam as closed-source software, was taken down due to a DMCA notice on December 9, 2020.

Steam's connectivity and APIs were integral to Tetra Online's multiplayer systems. As the code itself was deemed too difficult to modify for independent hosting, the decision was made to preserve Tetra Online's singleplayer component exclusively. This release also featured many aspects of Tetra Online that were yet to be implemented into the game, or were scrapped earlier in development.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Streets Edition
summary: With the Streets Silver Edition, you can declare your allegiance to clan Street. Get two iconic cars: the Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR and Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, as well as unique customization items.

name: Telejogo
summary: Telejogo was a dedicated Pong clone home video game console made by the Brazilian subsidiary of Philco-Ford in 1977. It includes three games and is widely considered to be the first home console to be produced in the country.

name: Tennis World Tour: Rafael Nadal
summary: Play as Rafael Nadal, playable with two of his latest outfits (Roland-Garros 2018 and the 2019 Australian Open).

name: Telstar Double Value Games: System Shock and Space Hulk
Telecube Nightmare
summary: Telecube Nightmare is a cute teleport puzzle platform where a cube "cuba" your enemies with only your teleport.

name: Tennistronic
summary: Increase your reflexes by hitting the ball that reaches higher speed with each bounce, and at the same time give it spin to score a goal to your opponent.

name: TecnoballZ
summary: A exciting Brick Breaker with 50 levels of game and 11 special levels, distributed on the 2 modes of game to give the player a sophisticated system of attack weapons with an enormous power of fire that can be build by gaining bonuses. Numerous decors, musics and sounds complete this great game. This game was ported from the Commodore Amiga.

name: Tetsudou Musume DS: Terminal Memory
summary: Japanese Dating sim that focuses trains.

name: Terraformer Expedition to Mars
summary: Terraformer Expedition to Mars is a first/third person 'Hard Science' based 3D simulation of survival, exploration and terraforming set on the planet Mars.

name: Tetris
summary:
Tetris was a game for the Sega Mega Drive that was cancelled due to licensing issues.

The game was subsequently released on the Sega Mega-Tech, an arcade cabinet that played Mega Drive games. It was re-released as part of Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 28: Tetris Collection in 2006.

name: Tempus Irae
summary: In Tempus Irae the player travels back in time... to Renaissance Italy. Tempus Irae was created to be a FUN scenario to play, filled with mouth watering eye candy, and plenty of ammo to accomplish the tasks at hand.

name: Tess and the Forgotten Friend
summary: The sequel to 2014's run-and-gun, Tess.

name: Tekling 2
summary: Become the Bot! Battle through 40 levels of classic platforming action. Gather the energy orbs to transform into the amazing mighty Tekling and escape the robots that have come to take you down.

name: Terry Poorflyer
summary: Help Terry Poorflyer escape an island ruled by evil crabs! Inspired by retro side-scrolling platformers, Terry Poorflyer adds own "stomp" flair to it, handled by physics engine more advanced than in HL3!

name: Tech-Panic
summary: Tasked with collecting presents, the goofy little robot boy is back and ready to do his best.

name: Terunyan to Amanoiwato
summary: Terunyan to Amanoiwato is a rhythm game in which Terunyan wanders around and collects elementals. Elementals can be efficiently gathered by collecting them in rhythm to the music.

name: Techium Eclipse
summary: Game made during Ludum Dare 2017

name: Teocalli
summary: Traverse 13 levels of the temple to find the lost treasure!

name: Tenalatro
summary: The Strategy-Puzzle Roguelike. Tenalatro scratches your casual chill problem solving itch, every run has a random collection of game changing modifiers, hacks, and new shapes. Want to compete? Global Leaderboards, a head-to-head match with friends, and the Daily Challenge are for you!

name: Tetsuwan Atom
summary:
Tetsuwan Atom is an action platformer video-game developed by Zamuse and published by Banpresto and released for Super Famicom on 1994 in Japan.

The game is a retelling of the 1952 manga with artworks based in the 1980 series (Uran and Kid Atlas are pretty notifiable). In the story, Atom goes fighting several obstacles like evil robots and monsters.

name: Teddy Roller 1
summary: Join Teddy on his sprawling adventure as he navigates treacherous paths and impossible hurdles. Traverse over 50 unique levels, that are sure to test even the most experienced player`s determination. Strange creatures pop up on the way, that seek to deter his plight in this retro-inspired game.

name: Terminal Voltage
summary: Terminal Voltage is a new episode of electric maps for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Territory
summary: Engage in intense interspecies conflict Expand your territory! Begin your journey as a tiny rodent struggling to solidify your place in this world. Avoid predators, grow, mark territory, and breed your way to the top of the food chain!

name: Terra Mango
summary: Terra Mango is a location-based strategy game. As a player, you can build virtual towers where real buildings exist, battle with troops, in real space, in real time. Nearly every building in the world can be captured and used to build your team's base. You can capture your house, your neighborhood, and your city!

name: TeleMorpher
summary: "Telemorpher" is a high-tech weapon that can shoot teleportation spheres. With it, you can teleport to the sphere's location. Your sole objective is to use this gun to escape from the mysterious laboratory!

name: Tested With Robots!
summary: You are the new employee of a factory that created levels for video games. You must test each level using robots. Robots are easy to control, but the levels to be tested are becoming more difficult.

name: Tekkaman Blade
summary: Tekkaman Blade is a 2D side-scrolling platform game where the player controls a mech and must find the exit to each level. The mech only has one melee weapon, but it can also use a special grappling hook, like in Ninja Gaiden Shadow, which is necessary to go through the levels. After the platforming part of the levels, the mech fights against a boss.

name: Terra Maega
summary: Congratulations! You're finally an Apprentice Mage; you're one step closer to becoming a Master. Travel the land forging relationships, crafting magical items, taking on quests, and having magical duels; all with the help of your cute magical familiars. Can you become a Master Mage in just 4 years?

name: Terminal House
summary: The first of terminal house series.

name: Telegraph Sudoku & Kakuro
summary: Play number puzzles from the Telegraph like you've never played them before. Discover a whopping 500 puzzles of multiple types. You're in for many hours of game play.

name: TerraGenesis - Space Settlers
summary: Engage in space exploration and terraform new worlds in this fun and exciting planet building simulator rooted in real science. TerraGenesis dynamically animates entire planets with changing biospheres, all based on real data from NASA.

name: Temple of Hue
summary: Temple of Hue is a 2D colour mixing puzzle game. Help the Jacklerats bring back colour to their dark world!

name: Tennis World Tour: Alex De Minaur
summary: Play as Australian revelation Alex De Minaur in Tennis World Tour.

name: Teeny Tiny Harbors
summary: Chart courses to direct ships and juggle seafaring duties. Expand your tiny harbor whilst keeping everything under control—and pretend the chaos is all part of the plan.

name: Tecmo Bowl
summary:
NES port of Tecmo Bowl which was also released in Arcades as part of the Nintendo PlayChoice-10 machine.

Through the NFLPA license, each roster mimics that of the NFL team based out of the same city or state. Tecmo Bowl only uses players from twelve of the best and most popular teams of the time.

Two NES versions were released in the U.S. The first is identified by its black and gold seal of quality, Eric Dickerson as running back, and Albert Bentley as a kick returner for Indianapolis. The second is identified by its white and gold seal, Albert Bentley as running back, and Clarence Verdin as a kick returner.

name: Temple Knight Saga: Oath of the Knight's Sword
summary: The story of the Three Temple Knights, dispatched on a secret mission, and takes place .Along the way, Sir Virginio accepted a request from a certain lady. But what truly awaits him. JRPG Quality. Translated with help from native English speaker, and not machine translation.

name: Temples vs. Buildings
summary: Temples vs Buildings is a roguelike with shoot'em up elements. The player will control flying temples of many cultures and fight against a vast array of flying buildings.

name: Tennis World Tour: Kristina Mladenovic
summary: Play as Kristina Mladenovic, playable with two of her latest outfits (Roland-Garros 2018 and the 2019 Australian Open).

name: Tennis Arcade VR
summary: Tennis Arcade VR is a fast paced game that combines tennis with other popular games and sports. Test your skills in a beautifully designed experience with advanced physics and arcade scoring system. Show off to your friends and beat them in local multiplayer tournament.

name: Tetris
summary: Tetris, developed by Bullet-Proof Software, was the first licensed Tetris game to be released commercially in Japan. It was released on most of the common home computers from the era.

name: Tetris DS Puzzle Mode
summary:
Tetris DS Puzzle Mode is the name given to an online Flash advergame that appeared on the Nintendo Arcade section of Nintendo's official website, where it was simply listed as Tetris DS. It is meant to function as a demo for the Nintendo DS title of the same name, specifically its Puzzle mode.

The game is themed after Super Mario Bros. 3, using graphics of clouds, hills and colored blocks from that game to compose the background. Two Green Yoshis using sprites from Yoshi's Cookie hold a big sign showing the level currently being played, and another one peeks from behind the game board.

name: Team Up
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of ultimate war between Terminators and Humans. Choose your hero from different playable characters. Fight and claim your victory in an epic VR death match.

name: Tetris S
summary: A Japan-only release of Tetris for the Saturn.

name: Techwars Global Conflict
summary: TechWars: Global Conflict is the world's first isometric pvp mecha-action with direct control. Only the strongest player will be able to win in this war of titanic mechs. Use all the features of world's realistic technology Techwars. Victory in every battle will bring you closer to creating your own death machine.

name: Test Your Mind
summary: Who said a test can't be fun?

name: Telefoot Soccer 2000
summary: This is the Game Boy Color port of the Nintendo 64 game Telefoot Soccer 2000. It was released as a tie-in game.

name: Teleport Jumper
summary: You are trapped in an underground maze. The only way out is through the exit portal but how do you get there? Fortunately, you have a short-range teleport that will help you bypass obstacles and reach your goal. You have a limited number of teleports in each level. Think carefully and plan ahead.

name: TerraFire
summary:
TerraFire is an award-winning arcade game featuring 3D-rendered graphics, realistic gravitational physics and 360 degree parallax scrolling.

Blast your ship through heavily defended underground caverns, past wind tunnels, fire-walls and subterranean lakes. Recover stolen nuclear pods using your ship's tractor beam, then carry them back to the planet surface and beyond into hyperspace.

TerraFire features 27 missions (including 6 hyperspace levels), spread across 5 unique worlds.

name: Tentacult!
summary: Tentacult! is a chaotic swarm control game set in a modern day Pleasantville which meets Lovecraftian Horror as your "Tentacutes" make friends with the community.

name: Temple Run: Idle Explorers
summary: From the creators of the award-winning Temple Run series with over a billion downloads, comes Temple Run: Idle Explorers. Join Guy Dangerous, Scarlett Fox and the rest of the gang on an epic idle game adventure as you explore strange lands, collect gold, discover rare treasures, upgrade your team’s abilities and try to become the richest explorer of all time!

name: Terrormolinos
summary: Take your family on a holiday vacation they will never forget.

name: Templar
summary: Templar is a 2D indie platformer and hack and slash game.

name: Tetris'd
summary: Avoid the deadly tetrominoes and stay alive as long as you possibly can. The game goes on for as long as you can stay alive. Try and get the highest score possible.

name: Tecmo Super Baseball
summary: It has 700 authentic MLBPA players including Ken Griffey Jr., Tony Gwynn and Barry Bonds to name a few. However, it does not feature an MLB license, so the cities nicknames and logos have been omitted, but all 28 teams with 1993 stats are still included.

name: Temple of the Wumpus
summary:
Welcome, Pilgrim

You have arrived at the Temple of the Wumpus, a holy shrine said to house the incorporeal body of the divinity known as the Wumpus. Pilgrims come to this massive temple in order to pray in the presence of the Wumpus's incorporeal body.

Explore over 100 rooms filled with hints, lore, and secrets. Kneel in prayer and see if you can find the slow-moving, divine Wumpus.

name: Tech Support 2077
summary: You are an AI sent to battle an overwhelming tide of computer viruses and malware - in VR! Shoot them with your explodo-revolver, or slash them down with waves of deadly energy from your plasma sword, and if they get too close you'll have to beat them back with your bare hands!

name: Terrierble Logic
summary: A game of logic, dogs, and questionable puns. Using the clues given, you'll arrange the elements and solve more than 75 puzzles that range from simple logic to fairly challenging. It is family-friendly and a fun way to engage with thinking in a logical way.

name: Tetripank
summary: Tetripank brings one of the most famous puzzle games of all time into the world of Unreal graphics! Your task is to avoid filling the game space, evenly placing the blocks at the bottom of the screen.

name: Teenage Crush Love Story Games
summary: Hello, teenagers! Are you ready for an awesome love story adventure? Are you looking for high school games with high school love storyline? Are you willing to help an attractive heroine win the heart of the boy she likes?

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - 1987 Animated Series Pack
summary: Get the Turtles in style with the 1987 Animated Series Pack.

name: Tell Me Your Story: Porcelain Puzzle 1
Tell Me Your Story: Porcelain Puzzle 2
Textreme 2
summary: A fully functional text editor topped with lots of juicy animations and effects that exaggerate your every action.

name: TechnoClash
summary: A top-down action RPG with over seven levels to explore.

name: Tetraminis Deffect
summary: A PICO-8 demake of Tetris Effect.

name: Teleroboxer
summary:
In a savage display of pounding moves and lightning action, robotic boxers from around the globe step into a futuristic ring. Mirroring the movements of the humans in control, each Teleroboxer is capable of surviving defense matches unbearable to mankind.

Slug it out to the staggering end to determine the true world champion. Created with specialized Techtronic powers and unique personalities, these responsive machines show no mercy on their way to the brutal top.

name: Terminal Conflict: Flower Power Upgrade Pack
summary: Includes the all the goodies from the Terminal Conflict: Commander in Chief Edition; includes the Flower Power Terminal (cosmetic), Steam Achievement, Unique Leaders, Policies, and Decisions.

name: Tehawar Puzzle!
summary: Tehawar Puzzle! is a simple, relaxing jigsaw puzzle game with original gameplay mechanics. 90 high-quality images to unlock, mostly featuring beautiful women in bikinis in fantasy settings (all images are SFW).

name: Tevris
summary:
Classic tetromino game in VR. 
One of the most awaited puzzle classics to be played with motion controls. 
Cute blocks, vivid colors, high scores, MEGA-mode and more to come.

name: Temporal Cross
summary: Combine tactical chess and card gameplay for a unique roguelike strategy experience. Choose your character, refine your deck, challenge bosses, and discover endless possibilities. Each card color triggers unique attribute interactions, unveiling hidden events for new adventures!

name: Terra Atlantis
summary: Terra Atlantis is a first person shooter for single players. Explore and discover thoses worlds and try to finish the trials created by gods from this far galaxy.

name: Terra Randoma
summary: Terra Randoma is a turn-based tactical roguelike RPG with a fluid combat system. You live the life of an adventurer in a procedurally generated open world full of curiosities. Your actions affect the world and your story emerges as you play.

name: TeaChess
summary: How would you like to play the standard Chess game with this design? Play a match against the computer and see how fast it plays, maybe you will win?

name: Techwars Global Conflict: Birthday Edition
summary: Techwars Global Conflict is the world's first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

name: Tesseract VR
summary: Tesseract VR is a puzzle game placed in a fantastic environment.

name: Temporal Deadzone
summary: Explore a place of dreams, frozen in time. Created for the LSD Jam 2022.

name: Tetris: Rosy Retrospection
summary:
Combines the joyful nostalgia of playing classic Game Boy Tetris with the established comfort of modern gameplay mechanics.

Rosy Retrospection includes a lot of additions and improvements like shadow piece, hard drop, saving scores and more.

name: TeknoKinetica
summary:
High speeds and faster times are the name of the game! TeknoKinetica is a 2D speed-running oriented platformer built for those who like to retry and optimize! Utilize the power of Parries and Rhythm to blitz through bite-sized stages in speed and style!

You'll need a good dose of speed and quick-wits to make it through with a high rank. Think you got what it takes, accelerator?

name: TerraMartis4x

name: Tense Reflection
summary: Tense Reflection is an innovative puzzle / shooter. Solve puzzles in order to reload your ammo / change the color of your shots while enemies are constantly progressing. Better be quick !

name: Tempoknight

name: Tennis Open 2020
summary: This gameplay feels almost real! In Tennis Open 2020 your real knowledge of tennis will come in handy, since proficiency levels, game styles and moves of particular players have been sculpted to perfection with amazing attention to detail.

name: Texas Butcher
summary:
He has no purpose...
He has no plan...
He kills for no purpose...
It's just an unlucky day...

name: Tecmo Bowl

name: Tentador Leches

name: Terrawurm

name: Telomere

name: Telly Addicts

Hosted by Noel Edmonds, the brand new Telly Addicts lets you choose to answer Adult or Kids questions - perfect for the whole family! You'll see fantastic clips from classic TV programs, tons of brilliant pictures and there are over 1,200 new, randomly delivered questions!

TechWars Global Conflict is the world's first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle will allow you to quickly master the management of new Mechs and get exclusive bonuses.
and gives you 3-Days Premium for fastest progression in the game.

name: Tekoha: A Tale Among the Stars
summary: Tekoha: A Tale Among the Stars is a narrative-driven light RPG following two Indigenous Brazilian sisters on an emotional journey to reunite after a tragic event reshapes their homeland. Featuring turn-based combat and a visually striking world inspired by the rich cultural heritage of the Guarani-Kaiowá people, the game offers an immersive and heartfelt experience. It explores themes of resilience and the unwavering fight to preserve Indigenous culture alongside the breathtaking environment of the Brazilian Pantanal.

name: Tetris
summary: Play Tetris for free in this browser-based online game. No download required.

name: Temple Run: Puzzle Adventure
summary:
Play TEMPLE RUN as never before! Beat match 3 puzzles to uncover the mysteries of the ancient temple realm. Create powerful combos and use special pieces to become a Temple Champion!
Assist the great adventurer, archeologist and Temple Runner Scarlett Fox as you solve puzzles to overcome the mysterious obstacles along your path.

name: Tenshi
summary: Don't Blink. They're Always Watching. Enter the haunting corridors of the Fukushima asylum, a short but intense bodycam-style horror game that will leave you breathless.

name: Teddy Boy
summary: In Teddy Boy you must scramble from maze to maze - each more magnificent than the one before it - bumping off bugs, guppies, snails, dominos and more as you go. Grab precious points for tennis shoes, teddy bears, snails, and other identifiable objects. And try to avoid the ugly Den Den, a snapping dragon head. Or you'll be forced to wake up to reality.

name: Tetsudou-ou '96: Ikuze Okuban Chouja
summary: Train board game simulation for PlayStation.

name: Terminal One
summary: Airport building and light business tycoon game. Build up an airport providing cargo, maintenance, and passenger service. Choose which upgrades to invest in, manage policies, organize finances, optimize layouts, and balance carbon emissions.

name: TeamTower
summary: As a prophet of the Secret Church, you will lead a team of characters with unique characteristics. Gain loot through events and battles, use them to enhance the team, and finally complete the great sacrifice.

name: Tesla's Puzzles of Lights
summary: Solve mastermind Nikola Tesla's* puzzles to prove yourself worthy to be his student. Start with only a few lights lit and discover each puzzle along the way. Move the lights around and combine their colors to activate every light. Challenge your logical skills in 150 puzzles. Are you bright enough?

name: Techwars Global Conflict: The Last Emperor From Hell Edition

name: Tex-Mechs
summary: Pilot a mech through the barrens of Texas and fight off the threat of an insect horde.

name: Tea for the King
summary: Make a cup of tea on a rainy day. You must make a Tea for King.

name: Test Your Mario Memory
summary: Test Your Mario Memory was an Adobe Flash game developed by Nintendo. It could be played from the official Nintendo website.

name: Tenuous:City
summary: An interactive music album using samples from and inspired by the PS1 game GERMS: Nerawareta Machi.

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama 2003: Passion Red
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama 2003 is a Sports game, published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Terrene
summary:
Terrene is a new sequel to the Sci-Fi action game Evidence of Life, it is created by Justwall Games and Albatross Wirehead. Terrene is a retro action adventure game with survival elements. You explore a giant procedural world to complete your mission tasks. Freely fly your ship from your orbiting space station down to the planets surface and disembark to play on foot and explore vast cave systems. 
 
Mine ores then store them on your ship to deliver to the oribiter. Once delivered you can use them to upgrade your player, weapons and ship. Your tasks include gathering a set amount of bio material from the planets fauna and foliage, harvesting the planet hearts (bosses), and finding hidden alien relics. The more you harvest the planet the more alien threat will increase unlocking different enemy types and increasing danger on the planet. 
 
Terrene is part survival game. You have limited oxygen on the surface, explore as much as you can before returning to your ship. Upgrade your player to increase your oxygen so you can spend more time and dig deeper. Player health can only be restored by harvesting planet fauna. Dying will return you to your ship and leave behind a backpack that you will need to retrieve to get your inventory back. Dying again will mean the backpack is lost forever. 
 
Use certain ores types to unlock and upgrade different primary and secondary weapons. Weapons to unlock include, rifle, shotgun, sniper lazer, and flame thrower. Secondary weapons include grenades, shield, mines and cluster mines. Homing missiles and bombs can be unlocked for your ship. Choose which weapons you prefer and spend your upgrades however you see fit. 
 
The Terrene world is procedurally generated by a seed of your choosing, it is 5000 blocks wide and is made up of ten different randomly generated biomes. Each biome contains its own plant and rock types, procedural textures, its own enemy spawn set, ore spawn rates and landscape style. Use your ship to quickly traverse the landscape, and set down wherever you would like to explore. The in game mini map uncovers where you have you explored to help keep track of where you have been.

name: Terror Diversion
summary: A text-based horror game in which you investigate mysterious urban legends. Along the way, the player takes on the role of a character who gets “lost” and encounters a series of random events.

name: Tenryu Genichiro no Pro Wrestling Revolution
summary: Based on pro wrestling legend Tenryu Genichiro and his own wrestling federation WAR, Wrestle and Romance. This game features a 3-way split screen to properly display the action in the ring and outside.

name: Test Chamber
summary:
Test Chamber is a stylish, difficult, and not-quite-euclidean puzzle game.

Guide our cube-headed hero through a mind-bending world, with levels designed to challenge your ideas of space. Discover a portal to the mysterious Warp Zone, and reveal the truth behind the Dark Stranger.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Sofia Kenin & Karolina Pliskova
summary: This DLC includes 2 additional female players: Sofia Kenin and Karolína Plíšková.

name: Text Adventure: Dungeon Empire
summary: Harken back to the days of high adventure when a hero went forth with nothing but a keyboard and a clunky green dusty old monitor! Once again, travel to distant lands, slay horrible monsters, and hoard treasure earned at the end of your sword.

name: Territory Control 2
summary: A 2D multiplayer sandbox game revolving around industry, innovation, factions, combat and emergent gameplay. Design factories, customize tools and weapons, fight or trade with other players or get viciously murdered by an angry badger.

name: Techblox
summary: Recreate iconic real world vehicles with breath-taking realism in the world's most powerful Free to Play block based vehicle building game.

name: Tennis Pong!
summary: This is not your average easy ping pong game. This is Tennis Pong!

name: Tetraspace
summary:
Brane is a mobile/web/pc puzzle game set in a four dimensional world. The player can switch one of the usual dimensions with the fourth dimension to navigate a 4D puzzle. 
 
It was inspired by the beautiful, long-awaited Miegakure by Marc ten Bosch, and can in fact be thought as a free alternative or at least an homage to this game.

name: Temple of Revi
summary: Travel through devastated lands solving color-matching sokoban puzzles to bring Nature back to life.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Half-Shell Heroes
summary: An official Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles game made just for your young learner! The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Half-Shell Heroes app invites your child to join Leonardo, Michelangelo, Raphael, and Donatello on an action-filled quest through the sewers and streets of New York City.

name: Terri-Fried
summary: Everyone is dead except for... an egg. Humanity is depending on you to make sure this egg survives. Balance power and precision in Terri-Fried, a game made in 72-hours with raylib for Ludum Dare 46!

name: Temple of Steel
summary: A first person survival horror game where you become trapped in a monumentaly vast place known as the Temple of Steel. Explore and escape it as its chilling abominations attempt to devour your soul, and as you struggle with a personal story of revenge, hatred and guilt.

name: Teen Titans
summary: Teen Titans is a video game released for the Game Boy Advance based on the television show Teen Titans.

name: Temple of Boonil
summary: Temple of Boonil is an abstract first person puzzle game with a unique striking retro visual style. Use lights and colors to clear obstacles and explore an ancient temple along with its forgotten history.

name: Tears of a Prophet
summary: Set in an original savage fantasy world, Tears of a Prophet is a retro-style RPG in the style of classic "blobbers". In it you will build a party of 5 daring adventurers who must travel to the remote valley of Farvale in search of the eponymous Tears, magical gem-like stones said to embody the virtue of Saint Solizra, The Spurned Prophet. During their quest your heroes will plumb the perilous depths of forsaken ruins, fight monsters, unearth powerful artifacts, win over the locals and bring light and hope of a world being Unmade by the decadence and cruelty of mortals.

name: Ten Days
summary: Ten Days is a small game about a young man' life in city. He need to save himself in ten days by make a game or find a job or whatever could save him. You will make many choice , go through lots of stories to make it happen . It is easy to play, Most time you just move and click your mouse.

name: Temple of the Lizardmen
summary: Temple of the Lizardmen is a Doom II mod intended to blend Doom's gameplay with Unreal in an ancient temple themed mapset.

name: Tenka Fubu Eiyuu-tachi no Houkou
summary: Tenka Fubu: Eiyuutachi no Houkou is a simulation game for the Sega Mega-CD.

name: Teddy
summary: Teddy keeps you locked in his house. You have 3 days to escape. Be careful, because Teddy can see and hear you. Find objects, remove locks and escape.

name: Tennnes
summary: Tennes is a local multiplayer game by Jan Willem Nijman, with audio by Eirik Suhrke.

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama 2004: Glorious Gold
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama 2004: Glorious Gold is a Sports game, published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Tempusia
summary: Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is the puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head :3

name: [Temptation Kanojo] Erotic Girl Temumi's Merry Christmas
summary: A simulation game from fuel-brain.

name: Ten Nights of Killing and Mayhem at F.J.B. II
summary: You can control up to seven students trying to stop a demonic Principal from world domination.

name: Tennis Champ!
summary: Tennis Champ is a fun tennis game with hundreds of tournaments, tens of unlockable characters and tons of different stadiums to play in.

name: Temple Raid
summary: Temple Raid puts you in an ancient temple that has been undisturbed for 10,000 years. Can you climb and puzzle your way to the ancient treasure? Can you out-smart the guardian to escape alive?

name: Terraform Inc
summary: Terraform Inc is a game to build a reliable physics-based delivery network. You will get new planets, add enhancements in transit, then deliver to buyers. Construct elaborate designs to prove your ingenuity. Choose your friends wisely, working to earn respect and unlock even further opportunities.

summary: The search for their father's identity has thrown the twins' lives into turmoil. Fearing he's lost his sister, Tyler continues the pursuit alone. Meanwhile, Alyson's guilt brings her into conflict with the people she loves most, as the heart-rending Tell Me Why trilogy concludes!

name: Temple of Spikes
summary: Temple of Spikes is a hardcore platformer. The search of untold riches and powerful artifacts in the ancient sanctuary - Temple of Spikes filled with deadly traps and epic bosses.

name: Tetris
summary: The Sharp X1 version of Bullet-Proof Software's version of Tetris.

name: Teal
summary: Teal is a turn based multiplayer strategy game with simultaneous turns; think chess with guns, that have mind bending trajectories. Games are played on a variety of maps, each with a different focus. Adapting your team composition and anticipating the opponent's next move is the key to victory.

name: Tentacles: Enter the dolphin
summary: A PC-based sequel to Press Play's mobile game "Tentacles", in which the parasitic adventures of the ink creature Lemmy continue.

name: Text Wormhole
summary: Text Wormhole is a dodge game of bullet hell generated by the roguelike way dynamically based on the theme of letters, which adopts the minimalist design style. The unprecedented visual spectacle will give you an extraordinary game experience.

name: Teleglitch
summary: Teleglitch is a roguelike top-down shooter with pixel graphics. The game takes place in a secret corporate research facility on an inhospitable planet far beyond the reach of civilization where something has gone horribly wrong.

name: Team Rise
summary: Discover the fun of team climbing! Explore all the secrets, shortcuts and traps! Share this adventure as a team, or do it alone.

name: Tetromino Attack
summary: Tetromino Attack is a very simple and easy to understand game, but very fun and addictive, perfect to spend a relaxed time.

name: Terra Tanks: Defenders of the Earth
summary: A cloud hopping, alien blasting arcade experience that draws elements from classic shoot 'em ups and other iconic games of the 80's arcade era. Assume command of one of the five legendary Terra Tanks to defend the earth!

name: Tentacles Invasion
summary: On the way back to Earth, the space freighter Nostromo 2 encounters an emergency, and crew member Veronica Wenger is awakened from cryosleep. The ship is infested with mysterious creatures, and there is no communication with the other 9 crew members. In response to the computer "HOLLY9000," Veronica embarks on a mission to save her fellow crewmates.

name: Terminal Velocity
summary: Terminal Velocity is an escape flight game. The pace of the game is very tight. The player's goal is to survive as much as possible.

name: Teleport VR
summary: With Teleport VR, you can explore ancient Egypt and Rome, medieval times, and even science fiction futuristic locations, all from the comfort of your own home. Image and category libraries will continue to expand with new fascinating locations and themes.

name: Tea Party Zombie Must Die
summary: Controversial flash game from 2011 - destroy zombie versions of Sarah Palin, Glenn Beck and other Tea Party members from the Obama Era.

name: Terminus
summary:
Terminus is a space-flight role-playing/action computer game by Vicarious Visions. It was released in 2000 for Microsoft Windows, Linux, and Apple Macintosh. Terminus won awards in the 1999 Independent Games Festival for "Technical Excellence" and "Innovation in Audio".

Terminus is outstanding in its implementation of Newtonian laws of motion, which means that objects are subject to inertia. Once accelerated, they float indefinitely into one direction, unless again accelerated into a different direction. This makes steering quite complicated, but mirrors actual behaviour in free space.

In Story mode, the player chooses one of four careers (United Earth League military, Mars Consortium militia, Marauder Pirate Clan, mercenary) and follows Terminus's single-player storyline, set in the year 2197. In 2000, Terminus was unusual among RPGs in that the player's actions can affect the ending of the storyline. Failing a mission, for example, may lead to a different ending than would have occurred if the mission had succeeded. One unique feature of Terminus is the story would progress with or without the player. The player could begin the game in story mode, then go off and do something else and the story missions/battles would still take place, reaching an outcome depending on which side eventually wins.

name: Tenchi wo Kurau: Sangokushi Gunyuuden
summary: Tenchi wo Kurau: Sangokushi Gunyuuden is a Strategy game, published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Test Subject Complete
summary: The concluding part to the action puzzle platforming Test Subject series.

- The Combatribes
- Block Out

- Double Dragon II: The Revenge
- Double Dragon III: The Rosetta Stone
- Mania Challenge
- Minky Monkey
- Mysterious Stones: Dr John's Adventure

summary:
A strategy game where you manage you won T.V. station.

You buy or make programs, schedule them and get advertisers.

name: Temple of Kasthet
summary: Brian Teaser must escape from a mysterious Temple by solving mindblowing puzzles before they, well, blow his mind.

name: Teeny Dungeon
summary: Traverse a teeny, yet infinite dungeon! Fight goblins and grab gold in the smallest rogue-like to ever exist!

name: Texas Lane'em Poker
summary: Texas Hold'em Poker on 3 different lanes against the dealer.

name: Teel Me You!
summary: One rainy night, lights of the dark city, a man meets his cell phone. What happens after that? Teel me you!

name: Tennis Kings VR
summary:
Experience the feeling of tennis in your home! 
Tennis Kings is a VR-sport game which you can experience a life-like tennis play in virtual reality applied realistic physical ball movement and spinning.

name: Tennis Masters Series 2003
summary: Are you ready to take on the world's best players in the Tennis Masters Series? Master the individual skills and styles of one of 67 different players, and then compete in multiplayer singles or doubles matches or single-player tournaments. The game reproduces nine Masters Series tournaments from locations including Miami, Rome, and Paris. With your four different shots--power top spin, slice, flat, and lob--you can create up to 60 different moves to use during matches.

name: Teenager vs.Tropical Mutants
summary:
Teenager vs.Tropical Mutants is a classic TDS arena where you have to fight off the waves of mutants that destroy everything in their path.
Use everything you find to destroy enemies.

name: Text Express
summary: All aboard the Text Express. The concept is simple, beat the opposite train to the next station. Use words as the coal to stoke the fire to get you there. Longer words make more fire to help you beat the opposite train. Get stoking now!

name: Test Drive: Le Mans
summary: Test Drive: Le Mans is a racing game for the Game Boy Color. The game features three racing modes: Arcade, Le Mans, and Championship. Le Mans allows you to race on the actual circuit, while Championship lets you race on 10 real tracks from all around the world.

name: Tea Time
summary: Bad guys have stolen the world's tea supply! Brave the obstacles of five different stages to collect as many falling tea items as possible!

name: Teachers Secrets
summary: In "Teacher's Secret" you become a young student who accidentally discovers that teachers hide deeply hidden secrets and romances.

name: Text Tiles
summary: Text Tiles is a fast-paced word spelling strategy game. Use the given letters to spell words horizontally or vertically. The longer the words, the more points you get. Spell two or more words at the same time for an extra bonus! The clock is always ticking, so use your time wisely. If you don’t place a letter quick enough it will turn into a block. Then you’ll have to work around it!

name: Tetris Illuminated Mega Screen
summary: Tetris Illuminated Mega Screen is a dedicated handheld game created by Techno Source.

name: Terror In The Atomic Desert
summary: Terror In The Atomic desert is a first person horror puzzle game made as a homage to 1960s B-movies.

name: Temple of Teuthis v1
summary: Large dark underwater base / temple adventure map with lots of exploration. Textures by Makkon, built on extras_r5 mod by Khreathor (already included) with features like ladders. Make sure to save often, and save powerups until you really need them.

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim - The Myth & Legend of Marauder Shields
summary: New story content! Two new Magnusball co-captains!

name: Tetrius 0
summary: TETRIUS 0 - allows you to plunge into the atmosphere of the mid-80s, collect lines, earn points.The game has music, endless levels, and a pleasant atmosphere of the 80s. The game was based on classic Tetris.

name: Terror in Christmas Town
summary: The player must find a captured elf who has been frozen by the evil Polar bear king. You must survive the journey past the roaming bears and enter the castle holding the frozen elf.

name: Terra Inferno
summary: Humans are ruining the lush world of Terra Inferno! Embody nature's wrath in this Turn-Based Tactics meets Resource Management Game, evoke natural calamities to devastate the human onslaught!

name: Teddy the Wanderer: Kayaking
summary: Join two friends in a beautiful journey among the nature! Teddy The Wanderer and his friend Piglet take an advantage of a spring weather and go on a kayaking trip! Entertaining and violence free story will keep children occupied for hours. Roam the colorful, hand-painted locations and meet Mr. Catfish, who needs a lesson in kindness! An unforgettable adventure, perfect for young minds, mixes fun and a healthy dose of learning. Our lovable characters solve numerous puzzles testing younglings' mathematical skills, eye-hand coordination, logical thinking and perceptiveness.

name: Tennis Antics
summary:
Tennis Antics is a mixture of tennis and wacky arcade action. Both players have a health bar similar to the ones used in fighting games. The objective of the game is not to score points to win games & sets, but to deplete the health bar of your opponent. This can be done in several ways:* First you can try to play the ball past your opponent. The higher the number of times the ball bounces on his side of the court before he returns it, the more damage is done to his health bar.

You can also collect & use power-ups that turn the ball into a bomb or a plasma weapon to hurt your opponent. Other power-ups available include ones that temporarily increase your running speed, give you the ability to steal a power-up from your opponent or give you a shield.

Finally, if you hold down the swipe button long enough your character will launch a special attack at the other side of the court. However, while you're building up this attack you can't hit the ball.

Players can refill their health bar by eating fruit & candy that appears on the court during gameplay. The first player to win the required number of rounds (1, 3, 5 or 7) wins the match.

In the single-player story-mode you start with only one character and collect 19 other characters by beating them in the 3 available episodes. Unlocked characters can then be used in exhibition games. The 3 episodes take place on a pirate-themed galleon court, a horror-themed graveyard court and a Christmas-themed wonderland court.

name: Terra Puzzle 3D
summary: Assemble the planet Earth as a spherical jigsaw puzzle in full 3D and at 3 levels of difficulty.

name: Telengard
summary:
Telengard is an earlier example of a "dungeon crawler" role-playing game--albeit with a top-down view- with either real time movement (DOS version) or turn-based movement and turn based combat. Telengard is also played in real time, which means that monsters can attack even when the player's character is not moving.

The player controls a single adventurer, selecting randomly-rolled sets of attributes: Strength, Intelligence, Wisdom, Constitution, Dexterity, and Charisma. The vast Telengard dungeon consists of 50 levels down and 200 by 200 rooms each level. Experience is awarded not only for defeating enemies, but also for finding treasure. When the player character gains a level, their attributes increase, and they gain the ability to cast higher-leveled spells.

Treasure chests appear randomly in the dungeon. There are also specific features such as altars, thrones, fountains, etc. that the adventurer can discover which may have various effects on the character, whether being either positive or negative. Some creatures will befriend the player, sometimes providing the player with an item and/or healing them, provided the player's Charisma is high enough.

name: Tennis Game in Roaring ’20s
summary:
Transport yourself back to the 1920s – the golden age of tennis – in Tennis Game in Roaring ’20s (World of Tennis: Roaring ’20s). Join refined ladies and gentlemen partaking in a good old-fashioned battle of wits and skill on the court.
Use swipe or touch controls to place shots and dictate where your player moves. As you play, our new tennis AI system learns your playstyle and can play multiplayer tennis games as you against other players when you are away.
Do you prefer to serve and volley or stick to the baseline and smash powerful forehands? Whatever your style, hit tennis courts and enjoy tactical gameplay while honing your skills. Compete with players from all over the world and become number one tennis champion!

name: Tekla
summary: Blast your way through an endless horde of enemies in this pixel art top-down shooter. Collect their remains in order upgrade your character for increased combat abilities. Tekla is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements.

name: Team Racing League
summary: Team Racing League is the first team-based racing game where you win and lose together as a team.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Gold
summary: Includes the original game with latest official patch and the Test Drive Unlimited Megapack add-on. The add-on includes 45 cars from manufacturers such as Holden, Edonis, RUF, Lexus and others, one motorcycle, a mode of increased realism of driving vehicles, an improved steering support system, as well as support for widescreen resolution, which is also present in the console versions of the game.

name: Terramancer
summary: Terramancer is a strategy game combining card combos and worker placement. Send your golems collect resources and be the first to complete your Tower. Use card combos to adapt your island to the seasons. Play with friends or take on solo challenges.

name: Telekinetic
summary: You come to your senses in a strange place, around the damaged bodies of people and a lot of blood, you have a head pierced and, instead of the left hand, its mechanical likeness, which is endowed with an interesting feature - telekinesis.

name: Terminate: Study X
summary: Become the machine, find out what happened in New Sapiens and eradicate the infected in a single player first-person shooter campaign of horror and gore.

name: TerraStorm
summary: TerraStorm, a survival city builder set after World War Two. In our timeline the outcome of the war… Will surprise you.

name: Tengai Makyou: Daiyon no Mokushiroku - The Apocalypse IV
summary:
Tengai Makyou: Daiyon no Mokushiroku, also known as Far East of Eden: The Apocalypse IV, is a 1997 RPG for the Sega Saturn released in Japan by Hudson Soft. It is spin-off of Hudson and Red's Tengai Makyou (Far East of Eden) series.

For many years this game was a Sega Saturn exclusive, however was remade in 2006 for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Gakuensai no Ouji-sama
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Gakuensai no Ouji-sama is an otome game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Tetote x Connect
summary: Tetote x Connect is an arcade rhythm game released by Taito. The game features a touch-screen interface, where players tap on the screen and follow the movements of their partner to dance to the rhythm! Players can customize their partners in a variety of accessories, and also play to numerous songs from anime, artists, and labels such as Sega, Vocaloid, anime openings, and many more!

name: TerraCraft
summary: a fangame of minecraft and terraria

name: Tell Me Your Story: Special Edition
Tetsujin 28-gou

A phone game only in Korean.

name: Teenage Demon Slayer Society

name: Tell Me Your Story: Ultimate Edition

Tell Me Your Story: Extended Edition
Tell Me Your Story: Definitive Edition
Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Akechi Tetsudou-hen
summary:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

In this entry, you can drive through a 25.1 km trip from Ena Station to Akechi Station, on Akechi Railway's Akechi Line. Pointing and calling actions in Narikiri driving mode and a slowdown brake used on downhills have been implemented here.

This game supports Zuiki's Densha de GO!! one-handle controller for the Nintendo Switch.

name: TED Tumblewords
summary: Slide rows of scrambled letters to spell words in this thought-provoking word puzzle game from TED. Play every day to level up and set new spelling high scores.

name: Tengam
summary: Tengam is a warehouse robot with one problem -- her magnets won't turn off. But she's not going to let that stop her from getting the job done.

name: Terminator Salvation: Fight for the Future
summary: "Join the Resistance and battle Skynet on an epic team adventure! SPACES transports you and your friends into the heart of the action, your pulse pounding and every sense immersed as you fight to save humanity! Our fate is in your hands."

name: TetraTower
summary: Behold, your enemies want your tower, use your tetriminoes to splash them out for good!

name: Terrorist Takedown: Payback
summary: Terrorist Takedown: Payback is the sequel to Terrorist Takedown. It features 10 missions with the same gameplay of its predecessor: a first person rail shooter with some third person helicopter levels.

name: Tekken 7: Lei Wulong
summary: The super cop Lei Wulong has joined the fray! Keep your opponents guessing by switching seamlessly between his five stances as you dominate the battle!

name: Tecmo World Golf
summary:
Tecmo World Golf distinguishes itself from all previous console golf games by offering 101 (yes, that's 1-0-1) authentic Japanese courses to play on. Choose from four male or four female players, each differing in power and shot tendency, or customize your own character. 
 
You'll be able to edit the golfer's name, appearance, handicap (from one to forty) and shot tendency, which determines the ball's trajectory after contact is made. You can also adjust each club's maximum shot distance and the golfer's starting tee position to improve your performance out on the links.

name: Tetris Keyring Arcade
summary: Tetris Keyring Arcade is a hand held version of Tetris released by Fizz Creations in 2022.

name: Teeny Heist
summary: Can you shoplift until you drop? In this shoplifting simulator you can steal everything from groceries to pets from a crazy pet store while avoiding the police!

name: Tempo Wizard
summary: Tempo Wizard is a funny four beats plan battle game.

name: Team Force 2
summary: A comic, funny and cute online multiplayer third person shooter game for everyone with fantastic cartoon 3D next generation graphics and captivating gameplay.

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama is a tennis simulation based on the popular sports anime and manga.

name: Tenchu: Fatal Shadows
summary: Two black-clad ninjas, Ayame and Rin, silently stalk enemies and strike with brutal Stealh kills in revenge for the massacre of Rin's village. With lethal blades and their own specialized attacks, the fierce assassins draw ever closer to discovering who ordered this heinous crime.

name: Teen Titans Go! Drillionaire
summary: Drillionaire is the sixth Teen Titans Go! game released online on the Cartoon Network website. It has six badges.

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Saikyou Team wo Kessei seyo!
summary: Based on the Prince of Tennis series. This game allows you to recruit players for your tennis team, train them to build up their statistics, join team building exercises like bowling and participate in tennis tournaments.

name: Team Awesome
summary: Super Hero Game

name: Tenkaichi Bushi: Keru Naguuru
summary: Become the strongest warrior in the world! With the support of your mother and amazing martial arts skills, roam the world to find quests and opponents to hone your skills and become the legend of fighting.

name: Temptations X: Darkest Fantasy
summary: Bringing back the classic memorize and repeat color match gameplay with high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! This new series of Temptations X features a new theme for your darkest fantasy needs.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Juan Martin Del Potro & Victoria Azarenka
summary: This DLC includes 2 additional players for the game Tennis World Tour 2: Juan Martin Del Potro and Victoria Azarenka.

name: Temple of Starlight
summary: Temple of Starlight is an abstract first-person puzzle game with a unique striking retro visual style. Use colored lights to clear obstacles and explore an ancient temple along with its forgotten history.

name: Tetrapod
summary: Tetrapod is an arena shooter with controls similar to Asteroids, with the player being able to move forward, shoot and rotate left and right. For every stage the player has to defeat a number of creatures ranging from killer bees in early levels to red devils and poison orbs in later ones. What makes this more complicated is that the screen is full of pods that when shot at hatches a lizard that immediately goes after the creature closest to it, no matter if that is the player or one of the enemies.

name: Termination Mental
summary: Small base level, a remake of the original Termination Central (E3M1).

name: Tenshi Doumei
summary:
Tenshi Doumei combines battlefield tactics and mech upgrades for an entertaining title. At face value, Tenshi is a tactical strategy RPG where you move units and attack or defend against cadres of adversaries.

Attacks consist of long range artillery attacks and close-range bouts where you invariably punch an enemy mech. The drawback of a punch is that the opponent will counter-attack within the close range. A long range fire attack will not prompt any return fire. Close range attacks are preferable in the first few levels because they inflict more damage.

name: Terraform
summary: Terraform is a new, retro style monster taming RPG inspired by games from the Game Boy Color era

name: Terrors of War
summary: Step into the heart of WW2 mayhem! Lead a variety of unique units into epic battles, master supply logistics, and unleash devastating strikes on your foes. Be part of this ambitious early-access project and help shape the game's growth and evolution!

name: Tetris Battle Fusion
summary: A version of Tetris for Android-based consoles

name: Tetris Classic
summary: Geometric shapes fall from the top of a playfield to rest on the bottom; fit the pieces together, and the line they form disappears. If the pieces don't form lines and eventually stack up to the top of the playfield, the game is over. Difficulty increases by dropping the pieces faster and faster over time.

name: Tetris 64
summary: Tetris 64 is a puzzle game for the Nintendo 64. It was released only in Japan in 1998 despite the whole game being in English. It is the only Nintendo 64 game that can make use of the Nintendo 64's bio-sensor which was included with the game.

name: Tetris
summary: Tetris is a licensed Tetris game for Fifth-Generation iPods with software version 1.2 or later, available from iTunes Music Store. It is of note that this game breaks some of the Tetris Company's guidelines, the largest difference being the lack of a hold function.

name: Terra: Destino Final
summary: Terra: Destino Final is a racing game between spaceships based around one of the characters of the soap opera Começar de Novo, where you can participate in exciting space disputes, compete against the computer or play online against other competitors with eight spaceships and nine worlds full of challenges and fantastic scenarios.

name: TESD: Into the Vortex
summary: After performing a mock-ritual during the 2017 Halloween podcast, Baron Von Flanagan unknowingly unleashed a power long since sealed and thrust all of TESD Town into another dimension. Take control of Bry, Walt, and Q as they venture into the vortex in an attempt to save all of TESD Town!

name: Tel-Tel Stadium
summary: Tel-Tel Stadium is a 1990 baseball game. The game is a typical baseball game where you are only allowed to control the pitcher and batter - once the ball is hit, you can only watch what the rest of the team does.

name: Tetroid 2012
summary: Tetroid 2012 is a Tetris clone for the PC.

name: Tempo Quest
summary: Multiplayer roguelike mixed with DDR

name: Tetromino Chill
summary:
Do you like placing blocks? How about placing blocks forever?

Based on Futilitris by Twinbeard Studios, Tetromino Chill is a game about chilling out and placing some blocks. Best when paired with some music or a movie.

name: Telethugs
summary:
Telethugs is an action platformer where you will take on incredible challenges with your friends in the most mind-blowing and deadly scenarios!

Watch out for the bosses that await you at the end of each level! Watch their movements carefully and create strategies to defeat them!

Kill the evil Luciano Huck and free all the oppressed from his clutches!

name: Teva 2
summary:
Come back to Teva 2 and ponostalgiruem. She will return you as a child when you were sitting in front of the TV for the console and having fun!
This 2D arknoid will make you ponastolgirovat about the past childhood and remember all those wonderful times.

name: Team Ice Cream VR
summary: Play alone in VR—or get together with a friend on PC and work as a team—to attract and serve customers ice cream. Earn tips to buy upgrades and outfits and move up in the world!

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo Special 2
summary: Main hero is high school student but he also steals money and assets from villains to return it to the proper owners. One day he received a request by mail to get "Blue Diamond" out of debt situation.

name: Terror Lab
summary:
You have just awoken without knowing who or where you are.
You can't remember anything but it is clear you are not alone.

name: Team Fortaleza 2 Mobile
summary: Join the battle of heroes with unique weapons and skills. Fight in the competitive battlefield or capture the flag, or you can fight the belligerent robots. Create rooms and play with friends or anyone. Tactics and skills will help you win, but don't forget to combine with teammates. Just fight!

name: Tempo Cube
summary: Rhythm with Tempo Cube! This is a rhythm game, Cube will bounce between walls and blocks to rhythm with the music. Use WASD along the move directions at the right time to score and combo! You may upload your own midi file to create your custom game scene!

name: Telegraph Crosswords
summary: Telegraph Crosswords transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience with its handy interface and intuitive controls. There are 500 puzzles for you to solve!

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim
summary: It's got action! It's got romance! In this RPG-Dating Sim, gather your party and try to settle a centuries-old dispute among your monster and human classmates! The fate of Winter Prom is at stake!

name: Teleport
summary: You capture aliens and teleport them off of their planets.

name: Tezotopia

name: Tetsu Ikuzawa Kanshuu Meisha Retsuden: Greatest 70's

name: Teikoku Sensenki
summary: A battle/love sim set in ancient China, about a military commander taking on enemies in 3-on-3 battles, then heading back to find romance.

name: Tell It Slant
summary:
Caught between a forgotten friend and unseen threats, you must find the angle where the lies you’re told start to reflect the truth.
But do not fear. If you fail, we can start again from the beginning.

Tell It Slant is an intimate and layered parable exploring friendship, grief, and what is left behind when power is traded for belonging.

name: Tetrack
summary: One simple but hard rule here - you must react very quickly to constantly changing conditions, tasks and speed. A challenge for real players with exceptional skills!

name: Tecno: The Base
summary: Tecno: The Base is a sci-fi puzzle-FPS set in the eponymously named Tecno Base, a remote research outpost. An accident in one of the labs causes all the robots to malfunction and attack the human staff. Over the course of the game, you play two playable characters, Alexia and Mika, who must solve a series of puzzles to piece together what happened and escape the base.

name: Teach Your Monster to Read: Phonics and Reading
summary: Teach Your Monster to Read is an award-winning phonics game, that has helped millions of children learn how to read.

name: Tech Romancer
summary: Tech Romancer is the name of a minigame collection for the VMU released with Tech Romancer.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: TerraTech: Falcon Genesis
summary: Inspired by the fastest moving creatures on Earth, the Falcon Genesis skin pack for Hawkeye and Venture introduces slick, aerodynamic block designs and raptor motifs, giving your Techs a smart new look as you explore the world via ground and air.

name: Team up with A Magician
summary: The orc magician who came down from the sky ended my lonely life. However, my peaceful daily life was also disturbed.

name: Terracon
summary: THE EVIL TERRACON is mercilessly wiping out the Galaxy, planet by planet. As Xed, the toughest little alien ever hatched, you have to face the Terracon Terror in the greatest adventure in the galaxy.

name: Tether
summary: Tether is an abstract arcade platformer about elastic connections and arcing flights. Swing and fly through 4 different game modes, in a peaceful, endless world.

name: Technotron Defense
summary: Techotron Defense is a stylish tower defense game with relaxing soundtrack and deep and hardcore tower defense gameplay

name: Technicity
summary: A first-person city-building game with powerful tools that allow you to build faster and bigger. Design your own construction blocks and furniture in factories, terraform the open world, build roads and use vehicles to travel to different cities that you or your friends create in solo or coop mode.

name: Terra Wars
summary: Another game set in the Terra World universe.

name: Tents and Trees
summary: A deceptively simple puzzle game written for the Fairchild Channel F. The aim of the game is to place a tent adjacent to each tree in such a way that the correct number are in each row and column, as shown by the numbers alongside. When you have the correct number in a particular row or column, the number will turn green. Tents cannot be placed if there is no tree to the left, right, above or below.

name: Tentacles of Submission
summary: Horny kraken with lustful tentacles versus anime girls!

name: Tenchu: Shinobi Hyakusen
summary: With the support of the fans, the 100 greatest stages of Tenchu is now available. With the editor provided in Tenchu Gaisen, this is the perfect challenge for Tenchu fans, and a great introduction to newcomers!

name: Tecmo Cup Football Game
summary:
Tecmo Cup Football Game is an unreleased Mega Drive game. In Japan where the game originated, it was called Captain Tsubasa and was based around the media franchise of the same name. As such, rather than being a straight soccer simulation, Tecmo Cup Football Game takes a more cinematic/RPG-esque approach to the sport, with the actual game being presented cinematicly and moves made by choosing from menus in a limited time.

This version was being programmed for the Sega Mega Drive in 1993; only Sega and Tecmo are listed as involved companies and the programming appears to be unique to this game. The game was not released in any region; the reason why is unknown. Because the westernized game is still similar to Captain Tsubasa in many ways, it is often pirated by Asian pirates as a genuine Captain Tsubasa game.

name: Temanava
summary: TEMANAVA is an Adventure/Exploration game where you play as a co-pilot who survived a crash. You will have to learn an unknown language in order to communicate with strange islanders and use your mysterious powers to find your commander!

name: Test Yourself: Psychology
summary: Test Yourself provides you with an affordable and accurate psychological profile. Test Yourself was developed along side professionals in the field of Psychology to bring you an accurate and aff...ordable experience.

name: Temple of Pizza
summary: Deliver pizzas to a mysterious party taking place in a previously abandoned temple in the woods.

name: Tehra Dark Warrior
summary: A third person action game, released for the PSP and iPhone, starring a half-demon girl with a large blade.

name: Tetris
summary: Tetris for Wonderswan Color is the first Tetris Guideline compatible game in Japan. Tetris is one of the great many versions of the famous soviet block-stacking game. Pieces made up of four blocks (dubbed "tetriminoes") fall into a 10x20 square well, and must be arranged into complete lines, which then vanish and clear more space on the board. As lines are cleared, the game speed increases until either the tetriminoes reach the top of the well or the player completes the goal for the current mode.

name: Terminal Hacker - Into the Deep
summary: Your sister Merle McPenrite has dropped off the grid without notice. Reports indicate that this is a fate she shares with countless others.
