name: Terra Earth
summary: Terra Earth is a 2D platformer with a mostly NES-faithful pixel art style. You can visit the six stages in any order, and the order in which you complete stages affects how the story plays out.

name: Technictix
summary: A music based game only released in Japan.

name: Tetris Girls
summary: The new block elimination tests your hand speed and brain power! ! There are also beautiful CG rewards! !

name: Temple of Tangram
summary: Do you seek wisdom, inner peace, and truth? Take yourself out of this cold, harsh world and embark on a transcendental adventure. Choose your own path on your quest for the legendary hidden Temple of Tangram. Enrich yourself with wisdom and experience as you puzzle your way through amazing landscapes. Find your way.

name: Tekken Bowl
summary: A free iOS game from Namco Bandai Games, based on the bowling minigame mode found in Tekken Tag Tournament and other Tekken games.

name: Tempo
summary: King Dirge is trying to steal the rhythm out of Planet Rhythmia! It is up to Tempo, the hyper groovin' grasshopper with special "Sound Energy" to save the world of music from the evil clutches of King Dirge.

name: Teslagrad Power Pack Edition
summary: Return to the indie classic Teslagrad and discover another tower in the magnetic North in Teslagrad 2.

name: TetraVex
summary:
TetraVex is a puzzle computer game, available for Windows and Linux systems.
TetraVex was originally available for 16-bit Windows in Windows Entertainment Pack 3. It was later re-released as part of the Best of Windows Entertainment Pack.
TetraVex is also available as an open source game on the GNOME desktop as part of the GNOME Games collection under GNU GPL.
A 32-bit Windows version was written in Delphi by Mark Billig.
The original version of TetraVex (for the Windows Entertainment Pack 3) was written (and named) by Scott Ferguson who was also the Development Lead and an architect of the first version of Visual Basic. TetraVex was inspired by "the problem of tiling the plane" as described by Donald Knuth on page 382 of Volume 1: Fundamental Algorithms, the first book in his The Art of Computer Programming series.

name: Temple of Aluxes
summary:
Have you ever wanted to explore a lost temple? This is your chance.
Find the treasures and escape the Temple of Aluxes by solving various puzzles and challenges.

name: Temple Guy: Quest for Chest
summary: A chest full of diamonds awaits you on top of the Temple of Despair! Challenge yourself and climb the temple in this 2d-precision platformer!

name: Terra Incognita
summary: Terra Incognita a 3D action RPG in the tradition of Zelda, with basic hack-and-slash combat, platforming and simple box-based puzzles. It was created for Net Yaroze by Mitsuru Kamiyama, years before he was hired by Square Enix and create the Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles series.

name: Terra Avoider
summary: Terra Avoider is a 2.5D shooter in which the player must survive through difficult, arena based boss encounters.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Re-Revenge
summary: Welcome to the universe of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Re-revenge of the Shredder! The city was attacked by a foot ninja army led by Shredder and Krang. Our brave heroes have come together to challenge them and clear the city of evil mutants and foot ninja. But will it be that easy?

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Embark on an pizza-fueled journey with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo to battle an all-new wave of havoc-wreaking mutants as you join forces with familiar faces in thrilling missions across the streets of NYC!
The Deluxe Edition features exclusive TMNT themed collectibles that pay homage to your favourite heroes in a half shell, including an awesome Steelbook and a radical artbook which tells the story behind Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed! Beyond the physical game, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed – Deluxe Edition includes the following exclusive items: · Steelbook
· 4 Pin Badges resembling the belt buckles of each of the 4 Turtles.
· 4 Keychains resembling the weapons of each of the 4 Turtles.
· Softcover Artbook.
· All contents packaged inside a collectible tuck-in box.

name: Tear Factory
summary: A game about hunting rats, feeding them to your family, and going to bed.

name: Teddy Gangs
summary: Beat the fluff out of them!

name: Terro Eliminator
summary: **Terro Eliminator: New Terrorist Tension Alert!**

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Ford GT 2006
summary: Inspired by the famous 1960s Ford GT40, the 2006 Ford GT pays tribute to the four-time winner of the 24 Hours of Le Mans. The design of this prestigious and high-performance car is reminiscent of its predecessor.

name: Tell Me Everything
summary: A mysterious murder has shocked the inner city, and as the lead detective, it is your job to catch the real killer. Armed with words and wits, you uncover the secrets and capture the murderer, and make sure justice will be served.

name: Templum Dormiens Dei
summary: A single level for Heretic, which requires ZDoom 2.8.1 or later. This map is meant to follow the events of Dark Deity's Bastion, and serve as an ending to the storyline which began with that level.

name: TeamPlay
summary: TeamPlay is a game where you can achieve maximum team chemistry. Play with friends against each other on the same device or create a team to play cross-network matches. Your team can consist not only of living people, but also of trained artificial intelligence.

name: Tennis Crackdown
summary:
Test yourself and learn some more with this challenging game!
Tilt your device to move the star over the hidden tennis players picture to reveal who it is before the star freezes.
Earn coins for every 10 correct players, use these coins to unfreeze the star.
Guess incorrectly and lose a tennis ball, get 3 wrong and its game over!
This app offers in-app purchase where you can buy 250 coins to use to unfreeze the star.

name: Teach Me Japanese Chess Pretty Please
Teleportower Plus
summary: Teleportower is a platformer / puzzle game. In each stage, the protagonist can teleport between each "tower" or screen in order to progress, with the aim of getting the gold crystal. 100 levels in total, along with a level editor and many custom stages (some of which come with the download). It is free, developed by "kaho", and can be found here: /~ss1/top.htm

name: Tetraptykon
summary: Tetraptykon is a set of four maps for strong limit-removing ports (PrBoom-Plus would be the minimum requirement, and -complevel 2 would be the preferrable option) that aim to merge oldschool-flavored slaughter gameplay with modern visual appearance. For the sake of the latter, @ukiro's OTEX resource set was also applied.

name: Terror World
summary: This is a survival adventure game. You need to drive a train to explore the world. Cold and a large number of enemies will threaten your life at any time. Can you survive?

name: Tears Fall Low
summary: Unravel the mystery of a fallen tear on its journey back to the surface!

name: Team Fortress 2 Classic: Fight or Flight
summary:
The Fight or Flight update, was the second major update for Team Fortress 2 Classic.

True to its namesake, it focused on content related to mobility, as well as several weapons and maps. Its flagship feature is the Jump Pad, an Engineer building that allows taking to the skies. The Anti-Aircraft Cannon was designed for Heavy to swat enemies out of the air, while the Twin Barrel affords Pyro greater mobility. The Brick gives Scout a hard-hitting projectile, while the Heavy gains Chekhov's Punch and the Pyro gains the Harvester - both weapons that store critical hits for later. Finally, L'escampette gives the Spy an alternate watch, allowing for easier escapes.

The update also introduces the Arena map Floodgate, the Four-Team King of the Hill map Frigid, the Payload map Jinn, the Four-Team Medieval Mode map Krepost, and the new Territorial Domination game mode with the map Caper.

name: Team Fortress 2: Death & Taxes
summary:
The Death & Taxes update, was the first major update for Team Fortress 2 Classic.

The update focused on cut content from Team Fortress 2. Its flagship feature is the VIP game mode, in which BLU team must escort the new Civilian class to the end of the map, while RED team has to assassinate him. To highlight this new game mode, three VIP maps were included: Trainyard with a single capture point and a one-life VIP, Mineside with a VIP-exclusive briefcase that must be delivered to unlock the capture point, Harbor with three capture points and no special gimmicks, and a VIP version of Badwater Basin with four capture points (later reduced to three) and a nighttime atmosphere.

Another major feature was the addition of Four-Team mode, shattering the previous paradigm of RED and BLU by introducing GRN and YLW. The new Four-Team maps were the Arena map Flask, and a Domination version of Hydro - which itself is a new game mode, with Oil Canyon as a two-team exemplar. The update also brought back 9 new weapons based on unreleased Team Fortress 2 content, as well as 6 weapons and 31 maps that already exist in TF2.

In addition, most mechanics were rebalanced based on Team Fortress 2 updates, and the vast majority of the game was refactored in design, interface, and content. The prior "deathmatch" game mode was removed entirely, as well as numerous weapon concepts and aesthetic choices. Finally, the update also included improved bot support for offline play, a new achievement system, nametag medals for developers, contributors, and beta testers, and many, many exclusive settings, console commands, and weapon attributes.

name: TennisVR
summary: The first VR tennis game on steam featuring Newtonian physics! Experience the feeling of tennis in your home.

name: Tech Shop Simulator
summary: Manage your own tech shop. Arrange the shelves, buy the products, put them at the price you want and sell them. Expand, organize and upgrade the shop. Hire and manage employees.

name: Tetris Plus 2
summary: A puzzle game where you arrange the bricks to make horizontal rows of bricks so an explorer can get to the exit.

name: Tegridy Puzzles
summary: Tegridy Puzzles Is A Jigsaw Puzzle Game Designed For Relaxing.

name: Temple of Cerberus
summary: Temple of Cerberus is a fast and brutal roguelite first person shooter.

name: Temple of Quake
summary: Small to medium-sized runic-style temple with a graveyard in rocky surroundings. The level can be finished fairly quickly, but in order to visit all areas and get better equipment it requires exploration and secret-hunting.

name: Teletext
summary: Welcome back to 1995. You turn your TV on, but there's an ad break! You press the red button to check out your favorite passtime. As you browse through, you see there's a lot missing. News articles not displaying, games out of order. Is anyone even keeping this updated anymore? Where did they go?

name: Team Buddies
summary: One fine and sunny day in the land that Buddies roam, there was a great and mighty disco in a tent. This tent would bob up and down with the music. All of a sudden, a large, flat, grey, flying THING blocked out the sun (The Great Eclipse) and began to drop crates. These crates were filled with all sorts of goodies such as Uzis and Bazookas. Inevitably, chaos broke out and the buddies became segregated according to color.

name: Tennis Tournament Hyper-Casual
summary: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of our competitions, where precious trophies - cups - are at stake! Exciting tournaments consisting of three intense matches await you.

name: Tekken 8: Launch Edition
summary:
The Launch Edition includes:
• The game
• Burning chain metal plate
• Corporation stickers
• Steelbook

name: Territorial.io
summary: Play against bots and other people online! Conquer territory and defeat other nations! Play with more than 500 players at the same time! Find a good strategy and become number 1 on the leaderboard.

name: Tempomancy
summary: Overcome any obstacle in the surreal adventure of the Tempomancer and discover the secrets that the forbidden lands of Fissra hide, always with Time on your side.

name: Tess
summary: Tess is a platformer run-and-gun game. It follows the story of Tess, an odd little girl who had a bad day.

name: Tessa's Ark
summary: A Sci-fi RPG set in a world where humans have shed the limitations of the corporeal body to inhabit existence as beings of pure thought. Solve puzzles to unlock the secrets of the digital reality.

name: Tehkan World Cup
summary:
Tehkan World Cup, aka. Tecmo Cup, is the first multi-player soccer game featuring a trackball controller.
Programmed by Michishito Ishizuka it was released to arcades in 1985 by Tehkan, Ltd., the former name of Tecmo, Inc. Its arrival coincided with the buildup to the 1986 FIFA World Cup. It featured the then colors of several of the world's top teams such as West Germany, Argentina and Brazil, although it did not mention any team by name.

name: Terraforma
summary: Grow your land by placing blocks & buildings while carefully planning your placements, and make your own little world in this small idle game.

name: Tensei Brave
summary: Due to the invasion of the Demon Lord, countries around the world have been destroyed. In the last remaining country, a hero is summoned. Players control the hero, gather allies, and set out on a journey to defeat the Demon Lord. Can the seemingly weak protagonist indeed vanquish the Demon Lord?

name: Tetradecagon
summary: Tetradecagon is the ultimate game of pong. Bounce a ball off of the highlighted sides of a user-controlled polygon for as long as humanly possible. It seems extremely simple at first, but it quickly turns into a brutally difficult game.

name: Temple Trashers
summary: A couch co-op tower defense game, in which the towers you build can hurt you and your friends just as much as they can hurt your enemies. Build towers, aim them towards your foes and collect the crystals that drop in order to build more turrets and survive the endless hordes of enemies!

name: Terra Alia
summary: Welcome to Terra Alia, an exceptional realm where the lines blur between technology, magic, and language. Designed to captivate and educate--transforming language learning into an interactive experience. Technology, magic, and language are intricately intertwined, creating a compelling educational escapade that transcends conventional learning paradigms.

name: Techwars Online 2
summary: A world of crazy fun and discovery of new genre all await you: isometric mmo mecha-action with direct control. Only the strongest player will be able to win in this war of titanic robots. Use all the features of world's ultra-realistic technology Techwars. Victory in every battle will bring you closer to creating your own death machine.

name: Tenko's Magical Sword Quest
summary: Upbeat precision platformer, with energized photons to reach a super charged state. Take yourself on a tremendous journey to collect all the magical stone pieces.

name: Tekken 8: Heihachi Mishima
summary: Heihachi Mishima is the third DLC character for Tekken 8 planned for release in Autumn 2024 alongside a free story update for the game that includes his return to the narrative and reveals his place in the ongoing events.

name: Terrestrial
summary: Terrestrial is a player versus environment Real Time Strategy game where the player commands teams of space explorers tasked with completing critical objectives in hazardous mission environments.

name: Texas Hold'em
summary: Apple's Texas Hold'em is back! To celebrate the 10 year anniversary of the App Store, we've brought back one of its first games, a popular classic. Originally created for iPod, then brought to iPhone, fans will love the polished redesign, featuring new characters, more challenging gameplay, and stunning graphics for the newest iPhone and iPod touch.

name: Temporal
summary: A freeware puzzle-platformer about a robot who has lost his memory. Using the propeller on his head and time travel platforms, he seeks to learn where he is, and his purpose. Explores the time travel mechanic quite well and features extra time trials and challenges. Released in 2008, created by Oren Bartal.

name: Temple2
summary: These six levels are loaded with tricks,traps and SPECIALEFFECTS such as: 3d-floors transparent doors deep-water sky walls visible floors that actully are not there(you fall thru them) floating corpses and much more..You must be a true nutcase if you make it through all six levels without cheating.

name: Team Assault: Baptism of Fire
summary: Team Assault: Baptism of Fire is a turn based strategy game set during World War 2 that is being made by Swedish developer Zeal for the PC. It cites its game design to be heavily influenced by other famous games such as Jagged Alliance and X-Com.

name: Testing Pool
summary:
A gothic cell with positive gameplay. You can fire the rocket launcher at stuff and pick your own route through the level.
Completionists can visit an optional extra fight which is a little tougher than the rest of the map.

Built with Eternity 4.2 in mind; If you use Eternity you get MOD music and extra text if you leave via the secret exit. but the map itself is perfectly Boom compatible.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Legends Pack
summary: The Legends pack unlocks 2 players who left their mark on tennis history in the 2000s: Gustavo Kuerten and Marat Safin.

name: TechnoRunner
summary: An indie Arcade Game mixing Rythm Game and Endless Runner, based on techno music with procedural generation. How fast can you go? How high can you score? Find out now!

name: Tedram
summary: In Tedram you can drive a car or two trucks and choose your profession, your free to do what you want, driving the car or picking up trash in the city or even deliver some pizzas. The main goal for a player in this phase of creation its to make more money as possible.

name: Teenyshire
summary: Draw a TeenyShire and maximise your score in 11 turns by following the likes of all the different elements.

name: Tennis Ace
summary: On your first serve, the ball explodes off your racquet like a fiery missile. Instinctively you move toward the net. Your opponent returns your serve, but you're ready for him. With lightning speed you raise your racquet and smash the ball. He never had a chance. You're the Tennis Ace!

name: Team Canada Table Hockey
summary: Improve your skills with a selection of fun and simple mini-games, competing against other players worldwide to see who has the best skills using OpenFeint and Game Center Leaderboards. Track your table hockey career stats and earn achievements for your milestones.

name: Tekken 7: Fated Retribution Round 2
summary: Tekken 7: Fated Retribution Round 2 is an update to Tekken 7 arcade version.

name: Temporal Sprint
summary: Temporal Sprint is a 3D platformer game focused on Speedrunning and Time manipulation (such as slow motion and rewinding.)

name: Terra Centauri: Last Stand
summary: Anime RTS Protect Terra from voracious parasites.

name: Tempo
summary: Tempo is a rhythm platforming game, but instead of staying on the beat... You make the beat!

name: Team Fortress 2: Love & War Update
summary: The Love & War Update, known colloquially by the fanbase as the Bread Update, was a major update for Team Fortress 2 that was announced on June 17, 2014. It brought a total of 5 new weapons, 4 reskins, 44 cosmetic items, 11 item sets, 29 achievements, 6 startup themes, and 15 taunts.

name: Tecmo Bowl: Kickoff
summary: A Tecmo Bowl remake was announced for both the Wii and the Nintendo DS. While the DS received Tecmo Bowl: Kickoff, the Wii version was cancelled in favor with developing and releasing Family Fun Football, a title that was thought to more closely cater to the Wii's casual userbase.

name: Team Losi RC Racer
summary:
Team Losi RC Racer is a one or two-player racing game that features 16 radio-controlled vehicles. You'll be racing against various opponents to unlock new tracks (15 in all), discover new cars and conquer the vast hub system that connects every track together. Discovering new tracks and bonus goodies involves locating any given rainbow-colored gate; after you're familiar with the tracks, you can perfect your times and utilize the gates to your advantage. Of course, you're not required to race every single time you play -- you can explore the tracks for said gates, finding shortcuts that will give you an advantage over the opposition.

Radio-controlled vehicles are based on performance ratings including speed, acceleration, grip and weight. There are four cars to choose from at the start of the game; whereas Krush is average in all areas, the Flame Dragon has incredible handling and acceleration features. Tracks incorporate surreal environments such as beachside raceways, mountainous terrain and a desert.

name: Tech Gone Bad
summary: Tech Gone Bad is a single Doom level for limit-removing ports created in 2016 by John Romero as a warm-up exercise before working on a new FPS game, Blackroom. It is an alternate take on E1M8: Phobos Anomaly.

name: Tetris: N-Blox
summary: N-Blox is similar to Tetris 1989. It does not use many of the new features such as the hold function and the four block preview. Players are also not allowed to change the keyboard controls, which they can in every other mode. The goal is to score as many points as possible. The speed increases after a certain number of lines are cleared. This is similar to other standard Tetris modes available in other games.

name: Tesco: Delivery Dash
summary: Isometric endless game made for UK supermarker Tesco's 100th anniversary promotion.

name: Tekken 7: Legendary Edition
summary: This version contains the base game plus 7 DLC fighters.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo V: Nerawareta Tenshi
summary: Main character is a lover and a producer of a selling singer. An incident occurred in which the acquaintance was shot dead during the singer live performance ruining the event. Hero decides to start his own investigation.

name: Tetrageddon Games
summary: Tetrageddon is what the internet does to people. Bring the internet to your desktop with stunning 8-bit graphics, monkeys, and a mild lack of self respect that games can be proud of today.

name: Teocida
summary: A surrealistic and spiritually provocative experience. Explore the ruins of a temple filled with puzzles, riddles, and secrets. Follow the Story of the Matriarch: a prophetess whose doctrine fell into obscurity.

name: Tetris
summary: Tetris For the Toshiba J-3100 series computers.

name: Terminal 64
summary:
Mario has retired from plumbing. He begins his epic trek into the desert.

Reflecting on his past, he stumbles upon Sparrot's Tavern and takes a dip.

You don't want to know what happens next...

name: Tears to Tiara
summary: Tears to Tiara is a Japanese adult tactical role-playing game.

name: TeamJumpers 2: New Reality
summary:
The ambitious sequel from Imperfect Studios!
TeamJumpers 2: New Reality, is an ambitious sequel to TeamJumpers. And the focus on this one's theme is interdimensional travel. Every 10 levels, you will discover a new reality. With challenging bosses, a simple yet fun combat system, and secrets to be revealed, this world is yours to explore!

name: TechnoTsunami
summary: Solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries of a space cruise ship. Fight or work together with robots which are remotely controlled by humans on Earth. Collect the technology coming from the future which might cause an apocalypse. Save the future and the past before it's too late.

name: Telestians
summary: Telestians is a turn-based strategy war game that takes place in a dark fantasy setting. Build armies, search ruins, conquer enemies, and hear the lamentations of their women!

name: Tell Me Why: Chapter Two - Family Secrets
summary: The Ronan twins continue to uncover Mary-Ann's secrets, but find that some people who knew her want the truth to stay buried. Michael helps Tyler adapt to life in Delos Crossing, while Alyson struggles with the tension between her brother and Uncle Eddy.

name: Terraria: Journey's End
summary: Terraria: Journey's End is a major update to Terraria released on the game's 9th anniversary. From new ways to play the game, to over 1000 new items to find and craft, to new bosses to challenge, and even a full-pass review of all content of the game for balance, graphic quality, and mechanics - truly, Journey's End has something for everyone.

name: Team of Titans
summary: The evil Mirror Clan holds dominion over the region of Latos. Everyone has lost all hope, except for one. An unlikely hero must build a Team of Titans and bring an end to the reign of tyranny.

name: Tears of Luna
summary: Danmaku style STG. What is The cause of the Emergency? Why the artifact finally appeared? Travel through time and space,dodge the bullet-hell, defeat the sorceress, and save your own world line!

name: Tender
summary: A young couple goes missing while going hacking and never seen again. Find out what happened.

name: Tengai Makyou: Kabuki Ittou Ryoudan
summary: Tengai Makyou: Kabuki Ittou Ryoudan is a fighting video game and the seventh game in the Tengai Makyou series. It was released on PC Engine CD on February 24, 1995 and was developed by Red Entertainment and Published by Hudson Soft in Japan only.

name: Terra: Battle for the Outland
summary: Terra is a FREE Massively Multiplayer Online Game (MMOG) persistent world universe in which Warriors battle with heavy weapons on personal and team levels to conquer the Outlands!

name: Terracity
summary: Huge underground necropolis in a Medieval/terracotta theme. It features the gremlin from SoA and has special optimizations for coop gameplay. The map source is included.

name: Tennis World Tour: Coach Sophie Walker
Test Drive V-Rally
summary: V-Rally 2 is a rally racing video game and the sequel to V-Rally. It was succeeded by V-Rally 3. The PlayStation version is known in Europe as V-Rally 2: Championship Edition and in North America as Need for Speed: V-Rally 2. The Dreamcast and Windows versions are known in Europe as V-Rally 2: Expert Edition and in North America the Dreamcast Version is known as Test Drive: V-Rally.

name: Tengu Otogizoushi
summary:
It's the Heian era.

Our heroine Sumire, who has always had a mysterious power, got lost in the forest when she was younger but was saved by an unknown boy. Today, she returns to that forest to practice her dancing.

However, in the forest, she meets a mysterious man with wings on his back - a tengu! A kitsune spirit appears to protect her but, with which side will she side..?

name: Tera M
summary: Tera M is the mobile version of Tera. This game challenges the traditional concept of RPG as the game doesn't have combat support nor healing potions. Players can play in a lot of different play modes, such as pve, pvp, guild siege, etc. Think carefully about the combination between your race and equipment and seek glory from defeating your opponents online!

name: Tempest: Tower of Probatio
summary: Tempest: Tower of Probatio presents a new standard for those who are bored with card games that use the same deck every time and take more than 10 minutes. The collective card game Tempest: Tower of Probatio, which is incredibly simple and unimaginably strategic! Comming Soon!

name: Terrorist Apartment
summary:
In this game, you can use different kinds of weapons, such as machine guns, small pistols, axes, etc. Props can also be used, such as cameras, flashlights, etc. Destroy any zombies you encounter, and keep your health alive.You will be alone in a dark, scary building, find supplies and weapons in the building, be aware of the zombies you encounter, and strive to grow and eliminate them.Please note that you need to attack the head, body, and lower body of a zombie to kill it completely. 
WASD control 
Tab backpack 
Left mouse button shooting, right mouse aiming, moving mouse control perspective

name: Terror
summary: What happened with human, who stay in subway... on the all night?

name: Tenebrum
summary: A heretic megawad containing total 35 levels, including secret levels. Intended to be played as a campaign. Also contains around 30 new monsters and 8 bosses.

name: Teppoman
summary: Teppoman is a simple run ‘n’ gun platformer that stars a naked hero. Terrorists have taken a number of your fellow nudists hostage and your job is to bust in, take the enemies out, and free your unclothed friends.

name: Tethernum
summary: A puzzle game where players attempt to convert all squares, across two interlinked grids, into the same color.

name: Telstar Double Value Games: Pit-Fighter/Wrestle War
summary: Entry of the Telstar budget double cartridge series with two games based on smacking people.

name: TerraNova: Escape Room
summary: You have been arrested for entering the house of a corrupt mayor, you are taken to the interrogation room, but nobody comes to ask you questions, hours pass and you are still waiting, you realize that inside the room there are puzzles that you can solve to get out out of the room and escape.

name: TeamPunk
summary: A steampunk twinstick shooter where you and your team need to work together to protect the Convoy.

name: Tekken 7: Leroy Smith
summary: An add-on for Tekken 7 that grants use of the character "Leroy Smith."

name: Tentaculon
summary: A game written by Ned Vole for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Terrordactyl Carnivore
summary:
Terrordactyl Carnivore is a thrilling dinosaur action adventure game! Fly your pterodactyl through a treacherous ravine to rescue lost cars from a prehistoric time-warp.

Defeat all pterodactyls by landing on top of them to advance to the next level. Munch all orbs before they turn into pterodactyls. Use the arrow keys to control your pterodactyl: up - gain altitude, left and right - forward and back. Use the space bar to breathe fire. Collect power ups to enhance your pterodactyl's flight (extra life, force field, super speed, destroy all, anti-gravity).

name: Tetsudou-ou 2: Sekai Seifuku no Yabou
summary: Despite the numbering, Tetsudou-ou 2 is the third game in the Tetsudou-ou series.

name: Tenkaichi: Sengoku Lovers DS
summary: A port of Tenkaichi: Sengoku Lovers for Nintendo DS.

name: Tear: Owari to Hajimari no Shizuku
summary: Visual novel adventure for PS4 and PS VR.

name: Tetr.io
summary: Tetr.io is a modern yet familiar online stacker developed by osk. Play against friends and foes all over the world, or claim a spot on the leaderboards - the stacker future is yours!

name: Tecmo Stackers
summary:
If you're looking for a game that the whole family can enjoy, then look no further than TECMO STACKERS. Against the computer or a friend, you'll go head-to-head in some fast-paced puzzle games that will bow you away. The object is to fill your opponent's side of the board while keeping your own side clear of any blocks.

If you connect four quads (blocks) of the same color, you'll create a chain reaction that will really give you an advantage. If you find yourself in a pinch, utilize a bomb to temporarily clear your board. There are four gameplay modes to choose from Arcade Competition, Time Trials, Chain Reaction, and Insane and more than 20 levels to master, making TEMCO STACKERS one of the most complete action or puzzle games available.

name: Techlie
summary: Techlie is a first-person shooter action game that progresses part by part, where you fight in another dimension as the scientist named "Aziz".

name: Teo Dove Pro Skater 2
summary: Skateboarding game in the spirit of THPS. Perform flip tricks, grabs, grinds. Insane lines. Level up your character and learn new tricks. Find hidden secrets. And challenge your rival to a classic game of skate HORSE!

name: Test Drive II: Scenery Disk - California Challenge
summary: In this add-on to Test Drive II, you must race through the Golden State of California. Divided into 7 stages, players will drive from the California/Oregon to Mexico.

name: Temporality
summary: Short reflective music game in the Great War.

name: Tears of Fish
summary: This is a maze game where handsome armored warriors accidentally enter a mysterious maze.

name: Terraria 2
summary: Terraria 2 is the sequel to Terraria.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo II: Minako
summary: The sequel to "Tenshi-tachi no Gogo"; instead of playing as the obnoxious male protagonist of the previous game, the player takes control of Minako, a female Japanese high-school student with a strong interest towards sexuality. The story mainly depicts Minako's sexual encounters with men and women, which take place on school grounds, in various locations of the city, etc.

name: Temper My Blade
summary: 100 ways to die to conquer a man. A man who can't be attacked-catch him and lock him up, then conquer him! Jianmang is the main attack, and the scabbard is the main guard. The strong is the supreme. The swordmand is above the scabbard, and the scabbard can only live as a tool.

name: Tetris E60
summary: Tetris E60 is web game released to promote the movie Tetris. It emulates the look of the original Tetris prototype for the Electronika 60 by Alexey Pajitnov.

name: Terminal V
summary: Terminal V is a game about speedsters with a unique control scheme that allows the player to move at insane speeds with full control. Dodge bullets, traverse obstacles, and mow down hordes of enemies with celerity and precision.

name: Ten Thousand Days in the Fire
summary: Medium-sized runic-themed map, built for Copper

name: Teeny Titans: Teen Titans Go!
summary: A game based on the "Teen Titans Go!" animated series. It follows the main character, Robin, as he seeks to be the best figure fighter in Jump City, a fictional city in the DC Universe.

name: Teacher Busters
summary: This is a German C64 game. Your mission is to hunt and kill teachers. While being banned in Germany it was still very popular among German teens in the 80s.

name: Teleporter
summary: Teleporter lets you watch & interact with game streams in VR with friends in a totally new way! It's a gamers' hub that has the soul of an esports bar, an old-school arcade, and your everyday game watching environment. Surround yourself with like-minded people and enjoy the game streams together!

name: Terrorween Playdate Bundle
summary:
Bubble, Bubble, Toil, and Trouble: cranks undocked & prepare for a struggle.

Wicked souls unite! There's a spook in the air this October. Welcome to the Terrorween Bundle. Be delighted with 8 eerie-sistible games with a touch of the Halloween spirit!

Don't let this spooktacular bundle slip away. Missing it would be a monster of a mistake.

name: Terra Formars: Akaki Hoshi no Gekito
TeeJay RPG
summary: Play as TeeJay Awesome through a Whole new RPG and try to stop Ivanos from becoming Dictator of America.

name: Telefoot Soccer 2000
summary: Telefoot Soccer 2000 is the French port of Michael Owen's WLS 2000, made in collaboration with Téléfoot.

name: Test Tube Titans: Taster Trial
summary: Take on your friends in a chaotic physics-based wrestling match using giant monsters that have been procedurally mutated to be unique every time you play. Or, craft a custom titan and take it for a walk through the neighbourhood, tearing up everything as you go!

name: Tender Frog House
summary: A wholesome one-day prototype.

name: Team Xtreme: Operation Weather Disaster
summary:
A disgruntled TV weatherman, bored with the stable weather conditions of his work place, changes the world climate in radical ways. A disaster task force called Team Xtreme is called to restore normal conditions to all places in Earth and fight the evil madman.

Team Xtreme: Operation Weather Disaster is a educational point-and-click adventure similar to Myst, one of its many clones that came out at that time. A typical full-motion video game of the nineties, it features 360º horizontal panning of some locations and easy puzzles for its target audience (mostly comprised of children).

name: Tensura: King of Monsters
summary: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: King of Monsters presents you with Ranga, Shuna, Benimaru, Shion, and other Monster Federation members to form a unique powerful monster legion! In the game heroes are divided into output, defensive, and assistant types. Arrange them in a 3x3 grid to bring their attributes and properties into play and display your strategic battle array! Dispatch heroes with close bond to trigger their synergy skills with astonishing destructive force! At critical moments, suppress the enemy with smooth, awesome combo skills!

name: Techno Trancer
summary: Listen in amazement as music syncs with dazzling action in this pulse-pumping, high-speed shooting game! In addition to the current 2 modes, a hidden AWAKEN MODE has been added! Use your awakened might to evade over 10 times the normal onslaught of enemy fire! 2 exciting new music tracks have also been added!

name: Terrapy
summary: Terrapy introduces the player to the complexity of caring for houseplants. Each plant requires its own unique accommodations and will react accordingly to the player’s selections. As is such when caring for each other, Terrapy illustrates the costs and benefits of personal choice and free will within a wholesome environment, integrating horticulture to nurture empathy and growth.

name: Temtem: Showdown
summary: Jump right into Temtem competitive action in this free multiplayer battle simulator! Build your team in seconds and dash into ranked matches with players from all over the world for pure, no-frills Temtem battling action—no leveling or taming required!

name: Tense
summary: Tense is a frantic action roguelite where you'll harness GunFu, Disco Balls, and Toasters to overcome demanding, fast-paced threats. Explore an unnerving yet playful city to uncover the secrets of HugFu and make some new friends along the way... if you can! No Rules, No Breaks, No Mercy.

name: Terminator: Dark Fate
summary:
Terminator: Dark Fate, Earth 2041 A.D. Humanity is on the brink of extermination as Terminators and Machines roam the planet seeking to terminate what’s left of humanity. Brave individuals form Resistance groups to battle for the limited resources that remain and fight back against the Terminator machines.

In this dark future, YOU become a leader of the Resistance -establish, build, and upgrade your own hidden Resistance Base, recruit and upgrade troops, research new technologies, and forge relationships with other players in order to defend and expand your territory.

name: Tenmei Dice Battle
summary: Move the map with dice, Battle with dice, Decide your fate with dice!

name: Ten Thousand Immortals
summary: "Ten Thousand Immortals" is a game of cultivating immortals in the national style. It is very easy to play. The original script of 100000 characters is an adventure in the endless world of cultivating immortals, presenting a real world of cultivating immortals for you!

name: TeleBlast
summary: TELEBLAST is a fast-paced, local multiplayer, combat game set in a time of explosive teleportation. Up to 4 players can take to the arena to try to outplay and outblast their opponents in a round-by-round battle for supremacy.

name: Ten Seconds Trillion
summary: Ten Seconds Trillion is a unique clicker game with simple goals but addictive gameplay. Can you reach one trillion value just by clicking and buying upgrades?

name: Tetroon
summary:
Are you a fan of classic puzzle games, such as Tetris, Bejeweled, or Dr. Mario?
Tetroon is the next evolution in puzzle games. Take to the skies with your fleets of tetroons (science balloons), where you will maneuver your fleets to complete the objectives for the selected game mode.
Tetroon is currently available with two game modes: Marathon and Countdown.
In Marathon mode, endless fleets of tetroons are yours to command. Maneuver your fleets with the goal of completing rows of tetroons, earning you points. The more rows completed, the higher the score. And, as the game advances, so do both the difficulty and the scores. Boasting of 26 unique fleet formations, the challenges are unlike any you have ever seen before!
In Countdown mode, you experience all the same great gameplay as in Marathon, but with the ultimate goal of completing a fixed number of lines. As an added challenge, you can choose a starting height in combination with a level, earning an additional score multiplier for each line completed.
Good Luck!

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: DLC Solar Content
summary:
The Solar Content pack includes:
- Maserati MC20
- Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 1LE
- Board Committee Member outfit for your avatar
- Solar Crown sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: Tea Talk
summary: "Tea Talk"? Are you a grumpy old man? Or a doormat? Or is there someone else?

name: Tender Offer
summary:
There's nothing a good old cup of coffee won't fix. Go on, get up, stretch your legs, you've been working all day.

And if the machine starts talking to you, well, don't be shy, and answer back.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Champions Pack
summary: The CHAMPIONS pack includes the ATP Cup, 6 additional official players including Andy Murray, Diego Schwartzman and Maria Sharapova, 4 new stadiums in London and Melbourne, and extra official outfits and equipment.

name: Tearstone
summary: Embark on an exciting adventure helping the mysterious Professor with an incredible discovery in Tearstone. Explore magical locations, uncover priceless artefacts and discover an array of interesting characters. Packed with challenging mini-games, unique puzzles and mind-bending quests, Tearstone is a unique adventure of magic and mystery!

name: Team17 Collection 1
summary:
Team17 Collection 1 for Evercade features a selection of 16-bit home computer games originally released on the Amiga platform. The compilation includes titles such as Alien Breed, Body Blows, Arcade Pool, and Kingpin, representing a range of genres including sci-fi shooters, fighting games, and sports simulations. It is notable for providing legal Amiga emulation on a handheld device, allowing these titles to be played in a portable format.

It includes:
- Arcade Pool
- Alien Breed Special Edition ‘92
- Alien Breed 2
- Alien Breed: Tower Assault
- ATR: All Terrain Racing
- Body Blows
- Full Contact
- Kingpin: Arcade Sports Series Bowling
- Project X: Special Edition '93
- Qwak

name: Tell The Forest To F*ck Off
summary: In this game you will yell at trees.

name: Texas Hold'em: Daily Poke it!
summary: Texas hold 'em is a variation of the standard card game of poker. The game consists of two cards being dealt face down to each player and then five community cards being placed face-up by the dealer - a series of three then two additional single cards, with players having the option to check, bet, raise or fold after each deal.

name: Tetris Block Puzzle
summary:
Embark on a thrilling adventure - Tetris Block Puzzle

Welcome to Tetris Block Puzzle, the ultimate mobile game that combines the timeless fun of block puzzles with the iconic Tetris brand.

Unleash Tetris exclusives, clear Tetriminos, and aim for high scores!
Challenge yourself with strategic gameplay, carefully planning your moves to create perfect Line Clears.
No internet connection is needed! Play anytime, anywhere, and immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Tetris Block Puzzle.
Clear rows consecutively to earn incredible combos and showcase your Tetris Block Puzzle skills!

A new Block Puzzle Game with a Tetris twist!
Same iconic blocks, new fun game!

name: Tetris Worlds: Online Edition
summary: An Xbox Live-enabled version of Tetris Worlds.

name: Tetraphobia
summary: Tetraphobia is an action roguelite set in a stylized world of floating islands. Utilise different bows to shoot, dash, blast and loot your way through different realms. Filled with unique enemies, bosses, artefacts and NPCs every new run is a new challenge.

name: Tenement
summary: A single player 2D arena shooter against up to 64 AI. Take place in epic Free-For-All battles across 8 stages or work your way through 200 insane missions. You can even create your own game mode with the mission editor.

name: Tennis Arena
summary:
With no stat tweaking and no licenses, Tennis Arena is arcade-style tennis at its most fundamental.

What you have here is single-match or tournament play for up to four players with wacky characters and a few different courts to play on. You can play an obese Chinese man, for example, and compete in a Roman coliseum whose clay surface seems to affect bounce marginally. That's about it for options though. No sim, Tennis Arena serves up roughly the same level of fun as Pong did 25 years ago, albeit now with prettier graphics and the occasional super smash.

The game also features special shots, with visible trails, fighter-plane-like sound effects, and higher ball speed. These must be earned however. After successfully returning the ball over the net six consecutive times, a yellow star appears under the character. You may then attempt to use the special shot, which entails lining up with the ball just right - but a failed special shot doesn't erase the stored potential.

name: Temple and Secrets
summary: Temple and Secrets - 3D, a game in which you, being a treasure hunter, will look for precious items

name: Technolust
summary: The world's first fully immersive Cyberpunk adventure made exclusively for the Oculus Rift Virtual Reality System.

name: Tecmo World Cup '90
summary: Tecmo World Cup '90 is a football (soccer) arcade game released in 1989 by Tecmo. An unofficial bootleg of the game named Euro League featuring European club teams was also released. An unfaithful home version was developed by SIMS for the Sega Mega Drive renamed simply Tecmo World Cup (in Japan, the game was called Tecmo World Cup '92).

name: Templar Battleforce Elite
summary: Templar Battleforce is an addictive mix of strategic combat and army building with the precision gameplay of RPGs. Step into a Leviathan mech and lead the Templar Knights in battle against fierce Xenos. Create your own unique Battleforce by recruiting an array of Templar specialists -- and invent distinct strategies for your fireteams. Deploy your forces in tactical scenarios that challenge both novice and veteran alike. Put your best strategies to the test and see if you can snatch victory from the jaws of defeat in this futuristic turn-based wargame.

name: Tekken 6
summary: A port of the version of Tekken 6 originally released on PlayStation Portable, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Tennis Tourney
summary: Allied Leisure's second game was a four-player version of Paddle Battle. It was the first four-player Pong-style game, predating Atari's own Quadrapong by two months.

name: Temerity
summary:
A time-traveling stealth game where you can use the past, but not change it. 
Set in the deceptively charming underground city of Aurora, Temerity takes you on a heart-wrenching journey of futility, loss, and morality that takes multiple playthroughs to fully experience.

name: Telepathy Zero
summary: Use your psychic abilities to compete against other test subjects and prove your psychic powers!

name: Tether Brawl
summary: An action-packed, top-down, 2-player game set in a sci-fi world with a hint of cuteness, players are connected by a tether and must fight against waves of killer robots. Will you work with your partner to survive or betray them for a higher score?

name: Terminal Land
summary: Follow the zany adventures of the inhabitants of Terminal Land, a universe in the shell. Genre-bending experiences spanning spells and spaceships define this epic multiplayer experience that takes place in a persistent universe.

name: Tenbu Mega CD Special
summary: Tenbu Mega CD Special is a Sega Mega-CD simulation game released exclusively in Japan.

name: TEOT: The End OF Tomorrow
summary: Game guide:To start Choose the language and level of difficulty using Vive Controller. Direct it to "Enter Virtual Reality" and hard pull the Vive trigger button twice. The game will start when the visual start.In game need to know: Press the grip to hold the gun or dagger.

name: Teisoukannen Zero: Yariman Kazoku to Hame Kurui Natsuyasumi
summary: A visual novel from Dwarfsoft.

name: Tetris
summary: A one- or two player puzzle game published and developed in 2004. This is an unofficial homebrew of Tetris for the Fairchild Channel F.

name: Tech Deck Skateboarding
summary: Tech Deck Skateboarding challenges you to pull off the same tricks that regular skaters do just smaller. You play as the inimitable Thumb Guy, a lovable mascot who can pull off the fingerboard moves with the best of 'em. Featuring arcade-style play and animations, the game lets you whip out grinds, ollies, and flips with extreme flair. All of the licensed decks from real manufacturers are here, so you'll be skating in style on your Tony Hawk deck. You'll have access to a limited number of boards at the game's outset, but as you get further and further along the road to glory you'll be able to unlock more responsive outfits and other hidden goodies. With cool graphics, real decks, and totally original gameplay, it's hardcore skating for hardcore fans!

name: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage
summary: TentaCat: Lost Lineage is a retro 16-bit action platformer where you play as Aqua, a TentaCat separated from his birthplace on a secluded island and wants to find his own kind. Journey through 14 levels, collecting items and power-ups, fighting bosses and unraveling mysteries of the TentaCats.

name: Telos Pragmaton
summary: Trapped in a small house with a deadly monster, use your wits and a mysterious device to survive in this fixed perspective survival horror. Keep the junctions charged so that you don't suffocate, but tread carefully as the monster will lurk in the shadows to hunt you, becoming ever more aggressive.

name: TerranLands
summary: TerranLands is a survival adventure game. Explore and gather resources in many different caves, build and craft new items in your home, and discover old Terran stories.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Double Damage
summary:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Double Damage is a 2009 online Flash game developed by Urban Squall as a promotional tool for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Smash-Up. It is playable at many websites, including, as of 2010, the official Nickelodeon website.

The game uses more 1987/2007-esque appearances for the Turtles, but most other characters take after their 2003 counterparts.

Each Turtle has his advantages. Leonardo and Raphael are more effective in fighting Foot Ninja, while Donatello and Michelangelo are efficient in battling machines/robots. Leo and Don have long-range weapons, and Mike and Raph have stronger weapons.

name: Technobog
summary: Hack and slash through the web of the corporate network in this merciless fast-paced 3D roguelite that blends freedom of movement and creative combat.

name: Tears To Tiara II: Heir Of The Overlord
summary: Hamil and the war god Tarte lead a rebellion against the divine empire in this Strategy RPG/ Visual Novel hybrid

name: Team Hot Wheels: Drift
summary: Team Hot Wheels: Drift is an arcade racing game. The objective of the game is to score points in the race to unlock official Team Hot Wheels vehicles and car paint schemes. The points are earned for collecting pick-ups, smashing everything in the way, and winning the race. While racing a speed booster can be used. The player race against ghosts of the best times. The game features only one track, two camera views and allows to change the color of the driver and car parts. After scoring 100,000 points the player becomes a member of the Hot Wheels Team.

name: Tech Madness
summary: Nice graphics, excellent atmosphere and uncomplicated plot - all ingenious simple! You take a rifle, look for parts to fix the radio tower and fix it - this is the whole simple, but ingenious Tech Madness!

name: Text Twist Classic
summary: Get ready for some word-finding fun game in Text Twist Classic! Around 1800 different words to learn! Look at the jumbled letters and find all the word combinations. Over 8000 levels. Two different modes to play: Untimed and Timed.

name: Testimony of Help
summary: "Testimony of Help" is an immersive short film in virtual reality (VR) that tells the heroic story of the Ulm family from Markowa - who provided aid to Jews during World War II. The project transports users to the realities of a village in the Podkarpackie region in the 1940s.

name: Terraformers + Starward Rogue: Mechs and Colonizers Deluxe Bundle
summary: Colonize Red Planet or fight in a mech - Mechs and Colonizers Bundle!

name: Temple with Traps
summary: Go through all the traps of the temple and reach the end.

name: Tengai Makyou: Deden no Den
summary: A version of Bomberman '94 themed after the Tengai Makyou series that was released as a promotional item in Hudson's newsletter.

name: Team-Z
summary: After an incident you wake up in a hospital in an unknown fortified village. For what and whom are they seeking shelter? Find your answers, help the villagers, fight of deadly waves of walkers, creepers and undead bosses.

name: Test Subject 901
summary: Trudge through haunting halls and desolate rooms, teleport through the darkness and hide in the shadows as you plan your escape. Feel your heart race as your doom looms ever closer. Find a way out before your fate is sealed.

name: Terror House
summary: An early horror game released for the Bandai LCD Solarpower handheld system in 1982. It featured two LCD panels stacked on top of each other.

name: Tetsuo Gaiden
summary:
Tetsuo Gaiden, a fantasy flight through the realms of alien darkness. Featuring the best CD-i has got to offer; amazing 3D full motion video, riveting gameplay and a smack in your face soundtrack... 
 
Prepare for more than 80 blazing levels filled with the best and fastest gameplay ever created on CD-i. Brought to you by the award-winning team from Christmas Country, Tetsuo Gaiden is jampacked with nice features like bonus items, multiple laser fire, smartbombs, energy shields and super bonusses. 
 
Get ready for the best game of spring '97.

name: Terao no Dosukoi Oozumou
summary: Terao no Dosukoi Oozumou is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by Jaleco Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Ten of the Best Games
summary: Compilation of the best games published in the Micro User Magazine.

name: TeamJumpers
summary: TeamJumpers is a Strategy platformer that allows you and your teammate to work together to get through tough obstacles and high places!

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Genius Boys Academy
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Genius Boys Academy is a Sports game, developed by KCEJ and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Tetris DS
summary: THQ's Tetris DS was under development for months and appeared to be nearing completion, but legal issues between THQ and The Tetris Company arose, leading to this version being cancelled.

name: Tennis
summary: Haunted House is one of the 12 original games that were shipped with the Magnavox Odyssey system. It runs on Cartridge No.3 and uses an overlay.

name: Tesla Motors Simulator
summary: A free game where you can drive Tesla vehicles

name: Text Adventure: Xianghua-hen
summary: SoulCalibur Text Adventure is visual novel of SoulCalibur, centered around the Xianghua. It was released for VMU as an online download after the release of SoulCalibur, only in Japan.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Tennis Champs Returns
summary: Tennis Champs Returns is a modern remake of the classic Amiga game Tennis Champs, developed by its original creator. It features a career mode against AI opponents, daily challenges, and optional mini-games, with both retro and modern touch controls as well as gamepad support. The game updates the original with improved physics, AI, and visuals while keeping its old-school style.

name: Tedd'or
summary:
Fantasy action-adventure RPG with an open world and diverse enemies.
Including a complex upgrade system and a lootbox-style way of obtaining new abilities.

The game contains a simple story you can follow to reveal secrets of the world you play in.
Multiple dungeons with juicy rewards you can obtain by putting your skills to the test.

The game also contains a competitive mode where you must defeat waves of enemies as fast as possible.

name: Terraformers: New Frontiers Bundle
summary: Terraformers & DLC: New Frontiers!

name: Terrible Lizards
summary: Terrible Lizards is a 3D horror platformer set in a dark Route 66 attraction. Navigate, survive, and uncover mysteries in a world where dinosaurs and danger lurk.

name: Tennis Masters Series
summary: The official tennis simulation from the early aughts.

name: Team Hot Wheels: Moto X
summary: Team Hot Wheels: Moto X is an arcade racing game. The objective of the game is to score points in the race to unlock official Team Hot Wheels vehicles and car paint schemes. The points are earned for collecting pick-ups, smashing everything in the way, and winning the race. While racing a speed booster can be used. The player race against ghosts of the best times. The game features only one track, two camera views and allows to change the color of the driver and car parts. After scoring 100,000 points the player becomes a member of the Hot Wheels Team.

name: Team Guardian
summary: An MMO-style action RPG with a 1:1 live PVP system! Dominate your opponent with your characters by strategizing the battles. More than 20 different classes for characters.

name: Tetris Pop
summary: 'Tetris Pop' is a game for J2ME mobile devices. The game consists of several minigames ("Mini-Variations") where the player must fulfill an objective in limited time. This game has cascade gravity in all game modes (even in Vanilla) and long ARE between pieces. A few minigames were later re-included in Tetris (PSP Mini) and Tetris (PS3).

name: Tetris
summary: An unofficial port of Tetris for the Uzebox.

name: Terror of Sea
summary: 2D Multiplayer MMORPG Pirate Game

name: Tears: Contact
summary: A visual novel released for the GamePark 32 in 2003.

name: Tesla vs Lovecraft: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Tesla vs Lovecraft: Game of the Year Edition is an updated version of the game optimized for newer hardware, offering improved performance. It includes the For Science! expansion. The game is set after Nikola Tesla's lab is destroyed by creatures associated with H.P. Lovecraft. Players control Tesla, using advanced technology to fight Lovecraftian monsters.

name: Teodoro and the Evil Machines
summary: TEODORO 's home has been attacked by monsters who are stealing the VITAL ENERGY from his world to feed his evil machines with which they are going to steal from other worlds. Recover stolen VITAL ENERGY and restore balance to your world.

name: Tennis
summary: This is a cartoon style tennis challenge that requires all your skill! Pick a character and journey through the game's tournament mode, or simply try your hand in free mode. Choose from different court surfaces and different match setup options. Offering games for one to four players, All Star Tennis is a great way to enjoy the action on centre court! Choose from sixteen different characters. Each one plays in their own individual style. Choose from various match options: Singles, Doubles, number of sets, difficulty level... it's all there! Different court surfaces affect gameplay. Choose from Hard, Grass and Clay courts. Multi Tap compatibility means one to four players can get in on the action.

name: Teddy Together
summary: Teddy Together is a life simulator video game. The game is based around the player taking care of a teddy bear.

name: Tenshi no Uta: Shiroki Tsubasa no Inori
summary: Tenshi No Uta: Shiroki Tsubasa no Inori is a video game published by Nippon Telenet Japan for the Super Famicom in 1994. It is the third episode in the Tenshi no Uta RPG series, but is not a true sequel to the first and second episodes previously released on the PC Engine.

name: Terralith
summary: Terralith is a Minecraft datapack designed to fundamentally overhaul the overworld with new biomes and caves. It accomplishes this without adding any new blocks, making it fully compatible with vanilla clients.

name: Tenkomori Shooting
summary: A minigame-centric arcade release from Namco, which focuses on many aspects of the vertically-scrolling shoot-em-up genre.

name: Tecmo Bowl
summary: The Famicom port of Tecmo Bowl has many roster changes due to being based on the 1990 NFL season.

name: TetraSquare
summary:
TetraSquare is a logic puzzle also known as Rectangles or Shikaku.
The rules are simple.
You have to divide the grid into rectangular.
The number indicates how many cells are contained in the rectangle and each rectangle contains only one number.
You can make a rectangle by simply dragging your finger on the board.
Tapping on a rectangle box will deselect it.

name: Tecmo World Cup
summary: Tecmo World Cup '92 is a conventional pseudo-3D soccer game.

name: Tekken 2
summary:
A port of Tekken 2, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The game was originally released on PlayStation and added more content to the original arcade game, such as new characters and additional game modes.

name: Test Drive
summary: After you choose a car, you have to drive as fast as possible without crash and without getting caught by the cops. You are equipped with the radar detector so you are informed about the approaching trouble.

name: Test Drive II: Car Disk - The Muscle Cars
summary: This addon for Test Drive II features 5 legendary cars like a 1963 Corvette Sting Ray, a 1968 Shelby GT500 Cobra, a 1967 Pontiac GTO, a 1969 COPO 9560 ZL-1 Camaro and a 1969 Dodge Charger Daytona. As usual the original game is needed to enjoy the addon.

name: Tempo Nuts
summary:
Tap to shoot nuts into screws at the right time. Watch out! If you miss one time, you will fail the level!
How many nuts can you product?

name: Tecmo World Cup Millennium
summary: Tecmo World Cup Millennium brings Tecmo's soccer franchise into the year 2000.

name: Tekken 7: Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition includes the full TEKKEN 7 game and all additional content eligible to the Season Pass.

name: Tecmo World Wrestling
summary: It's your call from the opening bell to the final pin. Select your wrestler and take on any challenge. Every bodyslam, every cobra twist and piledriver brings you closer to victory. Will you be the one receiving the Tecmo World Wrestling Championship Belt?

name: Tetris
summary: Experience the boldest, most vibrant Tetris game ever with enhanced graphics and sound as well as several new multiplayer modes.

name: Tether
summary: With the Tether Tech Roller (TM) you can Swing, Roll, Jump and Glide at great speeds without any injury! Explore vast landscapes and compete in the Swingball Arena, as well as other magnificent game modes like: Osmo, Racing and Swingshot. Play together in Co-op and Split-screen locally or online. Get your Tether Tech Roller (TM) today!

name: Terrible Laboratory
summary: A pretty and talented scientist, Konica Yaegaki, must earn money to save her laboratory from competing companies and peers who seek to destroy her reputation. However, she won't go down that easily. Follow Konica in this Slice of Life RPG as she tries to save her laboratory!

name: Tenchu 3 Portable
summary: Tenchu: Wrath of Heaven is an action-adventure stealth game developed by Capcom subsidiary development studio K2 LLC and published by Activision in North America and Europe and FromSoftware in Japan for the PlayStation 2 in 2003. It was later ported to the Xbox in 2004 under the title Tenchu: Return from Darkness and to the PlayStation Portable in 2009 under the title Tenchu 3 Portable by FromSoftware.

name: Temple Raider
summary: low poly adventure game made for Tomb Raider game jam

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi EX: Seiryuu Unten - Hasegawa Tetsudou-hen
Tennis-e
summary:
Tennis-e is the e-Reader port of the NES game Tennis.

It was distributed as a set of five e-Cards which had to be scanned with the peripheral in order to play the game on the Game Boy Advance.

It is part of a series of ports of NES games for the e-Reader.

name: Terror Quake 2
summary: Terror Quake 2 is a mod for Quake 2 heavily influenced by Action Quake 2 and building off of it with a heavier lean into realism, new weapons and items.

name: Terato Tamer
summary: The Scarlet Moon has risen once again. Darkness seeps over the land, unleashing the ravaging horrors that lurk within. Everyone else has run for their lives. I, however, have welcomed them with open arms and open legs. I've been waiting for this.

name: Tetris Friends
summary: A browser-based online version of Tetris with leaderboards and multiple game modes. It was the only official Flash version of Tetris.

name: Tempest 3000
summary: Tempest 3000 is a remake of the Tempest arcade game and a sequel to Tempest 2000, written by Jeff Minter for Nuon. It was released on December 12, 2000. By 2003, the game had sold over 20,000 copies.

name: Ten Seconds Hero 1
summary: Open world,RPG,Build,All Monster and NPC can be controlled.

name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame
summary: Help Annelise open the doors of the water mill (1st Age) or the library (3rd Age) solving visual and textual riddles.

name: Team Factor
summary: US Special Forces: Team Factor has a unique three-team scenario, with each team competing against the other two, all with overlapping objectives. Become a member of an elite fighting force as a Soldier, Scout, Sniper or Specialist. Players must move swift, silent and deadly in many drop zones such as a Siberian airfield, a Turkish bath, the Mekong Delta, a Middle Eastern port and locations in the US. The 3-D LightForce engine designed specifically for USSF brings the drop zones to life with superior graphics, texture mapping and extraordinarily smooth animations.

name: Tenkai Knights: Brave Battle
summary:
In this 2D-robot combat game, you can step into the role of one of the four Tenkai Knights heroes and must stop the evil Vilius and his army of shape shifting robots from destroying planet Earth and Quarton. Power-up your hero with over 100 customisation parts and co-operate with an ally to complete missions from the Story Mode! Up to 4 Players can also compete against each other in a VS mode to find out who's the most powerful hero!

For the first time ever, relive the Tenkai Knights experience in an exciting action game offering a lot of customisation possibilities and all the fun from the Spin Master Toy line and the animated TV series!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Anniversary Edition
summary:
This edition includes:
- Sprite Sticker Sheet
- Art Booklet
- Pizza Hut Personal Pan Pizza Coupon
- Dimension Shellshock DLC

name: Terry's Treasure Trouble!
summary:
Terry T. Cat is back, and he's going to hop-and-bop and cartwheel his way through the Feyside Islands in search of a mysterious lost treasure!
After finding a treasure map on the beach, our old cartoon cat Terry decides to go off to a land of adventure. However, a gang of pirates, led by the notorious Grand Beard, are also in pursuit of this legendary treasure, and will stop at nothing to get it.
Along the way, Terry will find Star Fairies willing to take a hit for him, ladders and bars to hang on to, bouncy springs, ridable vehicles, Mode 7 Special Stages, and minigames. Oh, and coins. Lots and lots of coins.

name: Tetsu 1: Densha de Battle!
summary: Tetsu 1: Densha de Battle! is a Racing game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by Syscom, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Tetris Diamond
summary:
A new technique that makes full use of "diamond block" is now available!

There are 4 game modes of "TETRIS DIAMOND": "TETRIS", "DIAMOND", "DIA.2min" and "PUZZLE".
In the new mode "DIAMOND" and "DIA.2min", a "diamond block" appears for every 5 falling tetriminoes, and if you erase the line with this block, the score will be doubled.

Get a BACK TO BACK bonus by making full use of "TETRIS", "T-SPIN" and the new technique "DIAMOND" that erases using diamond blocks! Please keep updating the record of high score!!

name: Terminal22
summary: Terminal22 is a bullet hell and puzzle game that uses the style of an old computer terminal. Hack into devices, dig through files and uncover the secrets lurking beneath the surface.

name: TEOM
summary: A tower defense game with rogue like elements and engaging levels with environments that change as you progress through the game.

name: Tennen Yawachichi Megami Flora Ama Ero Shinkon Kozukuri Life: Onee-san no Shikyuu ni, Suki na Dake Sosoide mo Ii Desu wa yo
summary: Enjoy the sweet newly-wed and "childmaking" life with this game brought to you by Norn! In this game, you're married to a big-sister-like goddess and your goal is to have some kids!

name: Terrawars: NY Invasion
summary: Terrawars: NY Invasion is a budget-priced first-person shooter that takes place in an alien-infested New York City. You play as John Armstrong, a medical student that's been drafted into the Army National Guard to fight the aliens. The game plays in standard first-person shooter fashion: Move through the level, kill all the aliens, and try not to get killed by them. In some levels, you'll meet allies who will fight the aliens alongside you.

name: Terminal Escape
summary: No docs. No tutorial. No escape. Inspired by a bad day with a package manager.

name: TetraLogical
summary: A turn-based slotting in / strategy game with a BIG twist!... Play either Solo, or against up to 3 CPU *or* Human players. Take turns to place your pieces onto the board, trying to score the maximum points you can with your current piece.

name: Tecmo Bowl
summary: The newer re-releases of the NES version of Tecmo Bowl doesn't have the NFL Players Association license, so it the intro removed and changes to the roster. It is based on the Famicom version of the game.

name: Terebron
summary: Guide Gwlader and his companions on the journey of a lifetime to save the dying god ! Solve puzzles with the mysterious Terebron, that the dying god sent you in order to reach your destination, and your destiny.

name: Tenchi Muyo! Toko Muyo: Aniraji Collection
summary:
Tenchi Muyō! Tōkō Muyō is an anime-like visual novel with constant video clips and CG events featuring full voice-acting for dialogues and Tenchi's thoughts without text-only descriptions whatsoever. The game uses autoplay feature and doesn't wait for you to press button to progress the dialogues, although they can be skipped. At certain moments player's actions let you affect the course of dialogues, but it does not affect an overall ending. The story centers on school love of Tenchi Masaki filled with love troubles. Key heroines from anime series, namely Ryoko, Aeka and Sasami are also present in the story.

Sega Saturn release came out several months after the original PlayStation release, but this package includes:

Tenchi Muyō! Tōkō Muyō game
Bonus CD with opening theme and three audio drama tracks
Bonus CD booklet features a short 4 page comic

name: Tekken 7: Cave of Enlightenment
summary: An add-on for TEKKEN 7 that grants use of the stage "CAVE OF ENLIGHTENMENT".

name: Te Encontré
summary: You are a 13-year-old girl who has gotten into a sinister summoning game and now you will have to do everything possible to complete the game before Darla finds you, avoid at the cost of being seen or heard by Darla using the hiding places in the house while Complete the puzzle to finish the game.

name: TerrariaCraft
summary: TerrariaCraft is a mod for Minecraft: Java Edition that adds content from Terraria, a 2D game by Re-Logic, by completely changing how newly created worlds look with custom terrain generation, bigger and deeper caves to explore, and many more new features and mechanics than just that! Explore a finite island to find resources and biomes, fight against mobs to survive, and progress through the mod!

name: Terrorist Takedown
summary: A first-person shooter for the PC that takes place on a nondescript land.

name: Terraform
summary: Terraform is a relaxing turn based puzzle game set in the future. Alter over 200 planets to allow settlements and forests to survive. Planets are made of hexagonal tiles that can be altered using many different tools and weather conditions.

name: TelAIphone
summary: A hilarious twist on the classic telephone whispering game played as a local party game for 4-8 players. Only now instead of whispering down a line you pass images generated by AI.

name: Teapot Poppers
summary: It's a race against time as you shoot colored marbles at the string of marbles rolling along a twisty 3D path amid an antique tea set. Hit them before they dip behind a teapot or cup! Match three or more of the same color to knock out all the marbles before they reach the mouth of a hungry cat. Be quick, or tea time will be over!

name: Tesla's Tower: The Wardenclyffe Mystery
summary: Fix the past, save the color!

name: Tempest
summary: Set in Vietas, Sweden, Erik is trying to keep his young daughter Linn from getting too cold. The dastardly winds from the aftermath of a blizzard are what is causing these sudden temp drops. In order to keep the entire cabin warm during this strong breeze, Erik needs to find some firewood to stay warm.

name: Tesco: Delivery Dash
summary: Facebook game made to promote the UK supermarket

name: Terapets
summary: Teraland is a fantastic world where humans live together with some creatures called Terapets. They have always lived happily in harmony with nature and the inhabitants of Teraland. But, for some reason, not long ago, the Terapets have lost their melody and, therefore, their light and happiness... What's the reason for this tragedy? They need somebody whose bravery and spirit will make possible the return of the melody to the Terapets. Could it be you?

name: Terasene The Light of Her Life
summary:
In this unique defense game, you take control of the sun to guard a young lady on her nighttime stroll. Except this young lady just so happens to turn to ash in the sunlight. So you'd better be careful where you're pointing those rays!

Control the direction of the sun's rays to drive off monsters who approach the girl. The sun will rotate right while the screen is being touched, and rotate left when you release your finger. Be careful not to shine light on the girl while her parasol is down, or she'll take damage. Her damage will heal over time, but if you continue to shine light on her, she'll turn to ash and you'll get a Game Over.

name: TetraMage
summary: A retro fantasy action/puzzle roguelite

name: Tecmo Cup Soccer Game
summary:
Tecmo Cup is a soccer simulator combined with RPG elements. As the game progress, Robin and his teammates will get better. The matches themselves consist of numerous choices what to do at each moment. If you are attacking, you have options to pass, shoot or to dribble. And when you are defending, you can either tackle, cut pass/shoot, or mark the opposition player with ball.

The game is a port and rebranding of the Famicom game Captain Tsubasa.

name: Tekken Card Tournament
summary: Welcome to the brutal, tactical beat-'em-up world of Tekken, as you've never experienced it before! Tekken Card Tournament is a new beat-'em-up CCG with real-time fighting duels and tactical, strategic, combo battles.

name: Teletubes: Electronic Pet
summary:
The infamous Tamagotchi - Teletubbies 3 in 1 is here again!!!

The children's Tamagotchi - Teletubbies 3 in 1 is a small console with an electronic animal that must be watched to grow up. The little electronic animal needs your personal care and attention to stay alive and grow.

name: Tendy: Robot Gardener
summary: Tend to the intergalactic flora and fauna on a puzzling space station. This short n' weird journey takes around 2 hours to complete.

name: Terro bot
summary: Terro Bot(also known as terro ant) is a silly top down shooter auto-aim game

name: Test Subject Name
summary: [Test Subject Name] is an FPS Platformer that sees you descend through layers of test chambers, fighting multitudes of robots along the way, using weapons taken from enemies, and coming in contact with intelligent machines that want you dead.

name: Terror of the Catacombs
summary: Catacomb Apocalypse is the final game in the Catacomb Adventure Series. It was set in the distant future, accessible via time portals, and mixed fantasy and science fiction elements, pitting players against robotic necromancers and the like. It is also the only game in the trilogy to have a hub system, though it was present in the original Catacomb 3D. It was developed by Softdisk and later republished by Froggman under the title Terror of the Catacombs.

name: Temple of Blood
summary: All difficulty levels are supported. Mouselook is recommended, but not required. For correct perception, the dynamic lights must be turned on.

name: Tears of Adria
summary: Tears of Adria is an immersive fantasy RPG where exploration meets unpredictability. Shape your party's destiny with randomized level-ups, face swift auto-battles, and delve into a world rich with secrets and magical items. Play either solo or with friends.

name: TerraFirmaCraft
summary: "Survival Mode as it should have been." TerraFirmaCraft is a modification for the sandbox survival game Minecraft. The mod aims to overhaul the core gameplay loop, introducing new crafting systems such as metalworking, environmental threats such as seasons & cave-ins, & an overhaul of the geological underground. The mod focuses on "believability" rather than "realism".

name: Tencho no Igo
summary: The classic Japanese board game comes to the PlayStation 3.

name: Tekken 7: Zafina
summary: An add-on for TEKKEN 7 that grants use of the character "Zafina."

name: Tekken 7: Ultimate Tekken Bowl & Additional Costumes
summary: The classic mini bowling game from Tekken Tag Tournament is returning back as "Ultimate TEKKEN BOWL" DLC! On top of that, more customizable costumes such as Blood Vengeance outfits, swimsuits, and Idolmaster costumes have been added!

name: Testing Facility
summary: Esselmap I: Testing Facility is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using a limit removing source port. It was designed by Sarah Mancuso (esselfortium) and uses the music track "Ordinary Story" by In Flames

name: TerraRealms: The Discovery - Episode I
summary:
TerraRealms: The Discovery is a 1st person, point-and-click adventure game strongly influenced by games like Myst.

You start in a dark forest with towering trees and a path. As you wander in different directions, you come upon a few caves. In one of them is a tray containing triangular-shaped pieces. By exploring further, find the clue needed to solve the puzzle in the tray. When solved, something else happens. And so the gameplay continues.

name: Terror in the Kitchen
summary: This is a first person atmospheric horror game. The style of the game is influenced by old graphics trend (PSX games etc). You play as a part timer in a restaurant. You wash dishes, take out trash, pump the toilets and organize the table tops.

name: Terres: Supporter Pack
summary: Purchasing this cosmetic supporter pack unlocks the player colour customization and supports the Terres development process.

name: Tetris Crush
summary: A game of Tetris played with guns.

name: Teacher Seduction
