summary: Math is such a boring thing... Unless you have a hot teacher! In this case, even her angry boyfriend might not be a big problem.

name: Teleportal 2
summary: Interesting challenges and 3D graphics. Equipped with a portal gun, you'll explore locations, move from room to room, solve puzzles, complete thrilling challenges, and find places to open portals that help you navigate through space. Levels will be challenging, filled with traps, dangers, and difficult logic puzzles.

name: Teleportal
summary: Here, armed with a portal gun, you have to explore locations, move from room to room, solve puzzles, go through exciting tests, and also independently find places to open portals that you move in space. The levels will be quite difficult, filled with traps, dangers and challenging logic puzzles.

name: Tekken 7: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Tekken 7
- 12" x 18" Kazuya & Heihachi Figure
- TEKKEN 7 Original Game Soundtrack
- Steel Book

name: Tetsudou-ou
summary:
A board game simulation similar to Monopoly, but with railroads. Its name means "Railroad Baron". It was only released in Japan, for the Famicom, and has two sequels.

Tetsudou-ou (occasionally with the subtitle "Famicom Boardgame") is a competitive railroad tycoon-type game where the goal is to own a lot of railroad stations and make a lot of money while bankrupting the other players. Tetsudou-ou also borrows elements from the Game of Life board game, specifically the lucky/unlucky event that follows every turn and can completely reverse a player's fortunes.

Tetsudou-ou would be followed by Tetsudou-ou '96 and Tetsudou-ou 2, both for the Sony PlayStation. The original game would also see a mobile phone platform remake, named Tetsudou-ou NEO.

name: Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection
summary: The hugely popular arcade and console fighting game, Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection is now available with an all-new ONLINE BATTLE feature! Take on other players from around the country, in full HD running at a smooth 60 frames per second! Prove who the real King of the Iron Fist Tournament is by checking the online rankings. Experience the pinnacle of fighting games as Tekken reaches into the "Online Vs." world for the first time ever!

name: Tekken
summary: Tekken is a fighting game and the first entry in what would become the Tekken series and franchise. It was one of the earliest 3D animated fighting games applying many of the concepts found in Virtua Fighter by Sega. Contrary to traditional fighting games that involve inputting commands as rapidly and accurately as possible, Tekken slows the action down by emphasizing rhythm, strategy and deception over speed.

name: Tentacle Typer
summary: Tentacle Typer is a Lovecraftian text editor RPG experience. You're a giant tentacle monster with a magic mechanical typewriter, and you're trapped in a steampunk mansion. Psychically rouse elaborate mechanisms by typing almost whatever you want.

name: Teenage Blob
summary: Half game. Half album. All awesome! A colourful art-punk adventure towards the best night of your life in a unique split release from Team Lazerbeam and The Superweaks!

name: Tetris Arcade in a Tin
summary: Tetris Arcade in a Tin is a hand held version of Tetris released by Fizz Creations in 2022. As its name implies, it is a portable game of Tetris contained in a tin similar to those used for Altoids mints.

name: Temptations X
summary: Bringing back the classic memorize and repeat color match gameplay with high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Teardown: Time Campers
summary: Saddle up and prepare for a wild ride back to a time when explosives were made from dynamite and sledgehammers were... still sledgehammers. Let your destructive imagination run rampant as you execute daring escapades across a fully destructible wild west.

name: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition: Collector's Edition
Tenkaichi: Sengoku Lovers
summary: Is an iOS and Android otome game.

name: Tech vs Magic
summary: Tech vs Magic is an action FPS where radically different enemies vie to control the fate of the world. Magical forces have erupted forth into our world, and threaten to replace our reality with one of their making.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Ninja Tribunal
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Ninja Tribunal is a 2009 mobile phone game by 4mobile. It is based on The Lost Episodes.

name: Teleport Tower
summary: Teleport Tower is a "Foddian" platformer where you navigate the map with a portal gun. It was created in 10 days as a submission for Ludwig Jam. It was made with plain old Typescript and HTML, using no preexisting game engine. Follow Dahlia's journey to recover her missing gem from her portal gun, so she can find her way back home.

name: Terebi Oekaki
summary: Terebi Oekaki is the game packaged with the Sega Graphic Board for the SG-1000. It is a simple paint program.

name: Temple of Boom
summary: Slay monsters to escape from the Temple of Boom! This explosive platform game challenges you to survives waves of deadly attacks. In Campaign mode, you will face ungodly creatures in three temples. In Endless mode, your mission is to kill everything and stay alive!

name: Ten People Ten Colors
summary: ‎An action puzzle game where you manipulate colors. PEOPLE suddenly wondered into a colorful world... Save PEOPLE as they run for their lives.

name: Tetris Kuromi Sanrio Key Chain Game Console
summary: Tetris Kuromi Sanrio Key Chain Game Console is an LCD Tetris clone based on the Sanrio character Kuromi.

name: Terracotta
summary:
Terracotta / 12 SP maps / Danzadan, Ing-ing, ionous, ish, JCR, muk0r, Newhouse, PinchySkree, prengle, Shambler, vaf, Andrew Yoder
Includes various custom skyboxes and map sources, and some of the maps may require a source port with increased limits.

name: TerraTech: Warriors of Future Past
summary: Blending influences from the warriors of Feudal Japan and classic Mecha-Anime, this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins for the Venture (Shinobi) and Hawkeye (Shogun) corporations with give your techs an iconic look.

name: Teeny Tiny Trains
summary: A cozy, nostalgic puzzle game where you build tracks to guide adorable miniature trains through bite-sized challenges. Solve clever brain teasers and rediscover the joy of your very first toy train set.

name: Tempest
summary:
This update to Atari's Tempest offers players an emulated version of the original arcade graphics, as well as "Evolved" graphics with particle effects, lighting, and shading. Both games feature a classic mode, and a speed-increased "Throttle Monkey" mode.

Players must guide their horseshoe-shaped craft around the edges of 3-D geometric shapes. Enemies at the far end of the playing field move toward the player, and must be shot before they reach the edge. Players can also deploy their "Super-Zapper" once per level to clear the screen of enemies. Each level is a different shape, and progressive levels add new enemy types and more of them, requiring ever-faster reflexes.

The game only offers online play, but two players can control two separate craft and play cooperatively. Players try for their highest score, which is then uploaded and tracked on the game's online leaderboards.

name: Terminal Earth
summary: Terminal Earth is a survival road trip. The world you once new turned into oblivion, can you survive it and join other survivors in the eldorado ? Loot, craft, fight, drive and solve puzzles to survive and find a way out of this hostile hand crafted open world !

name: Ten Pin Alley 2
summary: Bowling game that offers two gameplay options: you can either practice with up to three other players on the same system, or head into a tournament layout for competition against three other computer opponents. Players have the choice of eight different competitors and four different alleys. Ten Pin Alley 2's gameplay is a four click affair: first, mark the spot on the lane you want to stand. Then, watch the aim arrow bounce back and forth on the alley. Hit the button again, and set the power of the throw. The fourth button click sets how much or little a hook you want to throw. Released on a 32 megabit Game Boy Advance cartridge, the game was based on the cell phone game of the same name.

name: Temple Run 2
summary:
The sequel to the smash hit phenomenon that took the world by storm!
Navigate perilous cliffs, zip lines, mines and forests as you try to escape with the cursed idol. How far can you run?!

name: Tesla Legacy
summary: Explore a secret facility and use the power of electricity to defeat all machines, a new VR combat experience waiting to challenge your skills.

name: Tercity Life Simulator
summary: Tercity Life Simulator is an exciting open-world game where you can explore a big city, make friends, start a family, find interesting jobs, buy real estate and more.

name: Tech Jump Remastered
summary: A game about portals, lasers, and four rooms! Soon to be Remastered!

name: Tennis Story
summary:
A tennis game that's not about what happens on the court.

It's about being young, not having a care in the world. It's about the adventures with your friends you'll remember for the rest of your life.

name: Temple of Rust
summary: A game about learning to use an ancient sling against oppression. Top-down arena action with procedural elements.

name: Texas Border Guard
summary: This is a first-person shooter game, the late 21st century, the world is overcrowded, the world is full of hunger and viruses. Small countries have long been crowded in by refugees from all over the world. However, aliens also appeared in this world. Because the whole world is paralyzed.

name: Temporarily
summary: Temporality is a first-person game where the player takes on the role of Jack who wakes up in a room without knowing how the protagonist got here and must travel through the past. of him and his wife to find the truth.

name: Terrorists!
summary: t's more than just a reskin of Nazis. Really, apart from the bullet tracers, this is effectively designed from scratch, using borrowed TekWar enemy sprites to give the mod a sort of Lethal Enforcers/Operation Wolf 3 feel. Terrorists! is intended as a tribute to 1980's and 1990's action movies like Commando, Die Hard, Under Siege, Total Recall, and The Terminator. The focus here is on giving you all the tools you need to become your own Man of Action.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo III: Bangai-hen
summary:
The second Bangai-hen (a side story) in the Tenshitachi no Gogo series is set in the same environment and features recurrent characters from Tenshitachi no Gogo 3: Ribbon. The protagonist is a high-school student, who also happens to be the brother of Haru Okamoto, the main love interest in Ribbon. Like in most other games in this series, the story revolves around the main character's effort to have sex with every female character, including school mates and colleagues in part-time jobs.

The gameplay is identical to the one in Ribbon or in the previous Bangai-hen: the player proceeds through still screens, typically depleting the available menu commands (verbs and object sub-menus) until a new command appears or an event is triggered. Like in most other games in the series, there are multiple dead ends and possible actions that lead to premature end of the game.

name: Tenshi no Uta
summary: Tenshi no Uta is a standard JRPG that also incorporates monster negotiation to gain additional items through monster shops and monsters to fight alongside with during battles.

name: Terafall
summary: You are a mercenary on the dying planet of Tera, where every day is a struggle for survival. Create your own legacy as you overcome a planet dominated by dangerous beasts, cutthroat brigands, and a ruthless and powerful governing corporation.

name: Temple of the Lizardmen 3
summary: Temple of the Lizardmen 3 is a 32 map wad and the third entry of the Temple of the Lizardmen series of Doom wads known for borrowing elements from the Unreal games

name: Terry's Other Games
summary: Hi, I'm Terry Cavanagh! You might remember me from such videogames as Dicey Dungeons, Super Hexagon, and VVVVVV. Here are a few other things I've made over the years!

name: Test the limits of your courage! Hanechari
summary:
You're going to crash! Keep going!
Pedal with your legs and experience the thrill and exhilaration of free-flying through magnificent natural scenery on a winged bicycle!
With our specially developed sensory machine, you'll feel the wind and experience the true thrill of flight.
Feel the excitement and tension as you fly over mountain surfaces and plunge through waterfalls, dodging rocky cliffs along the way.

name: Temple of Lust
summary: A map designed for Torn's Doom Advent Calendar 2005 day 3

name: Terra Alia: Multiplayer
summary: A new mode where you can play with others!

name: Ted The Jumper
summary: Duck into Ted the Jumper, a splash of fun! Help Ted stay high and dry by getting him across floating blocks. Use your tactical wit to collect all wooden blocks. While the mesmerizing sound of rippling water sooths your mind, obstacles will pose serious challenges. Jump forward, left and right without getting wet feet. Enjoy a colorful affair in Ted the Jumper!

name: Texas Hold 'Em Poker
summary: A mobile poker game by Gameloft.

name: Terror Shooter Apocalypse
summary: You remained the sole survivor of the city after a massive enemy attack in this part of Europe.

name: Temple Crawler
summary: A tactical roguelike dungeon crawler, featuring an intuitive yet deep core mechanic. Acquire powerful artifacts to forge your path through dungeons filled with ruthless enemies and dangerous traps. Embark on this epic adventure and fulfill your quest for glory!

name: TetrisMD
summary: A Homebrew Tetris Game for the Sega Megadrive/Genesis, write with C and using SGDK.

name: Tenchi Muyo! Toko Muyo
summary: Tenchi Muyo! Toko Muyo is a visual novel style game made for the PSX. It features a variety of characters from the series placed into a High School setting.

name: Terrorist Takedown 3
summary: Terrorist Takedown 3 is the third installment of a series of action games by the Polish CITY Interactive studio. The player takes on the role of a member of an anti-terrorist unit, which is sent to Somalia in order to rebound a ship kidnapped off the coast there.

name: Tekichuu Keiba Juku
summary: Tekichuu Keiba Juku is a Sports game, published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Tentoria
summary: Character action game with lightning fast action. Play as the badass femme fatale vampire queen, Lyss, and get ready to yell "This is not even my final form!". Travel through time, destroy dinosaurs, aliens, robots and undeads with bloody stylish combos! Ride your motorcycle, manage your strip club!

name: Temple Run: Oz
summary: This game is a spinoff game of Temple Run themed around the Wizard of Oz.

name: Temper Tantrum
summary: Play as toddler Little Johnny and earn points by destroying household objects, collecting candy, and escaping the threat of various enemies wishing to put Little Johnny back to bed.

name: TempleFight
summary: Temple Fight is a An action game which talks about somebody which lost his father while fighting with the ghost and there soldier and he wants to Take revenge for his father so he will fight the ghosts and their soldier could you help him?

name: TerraTech: Fantabulous Contraptions
summary: Follow in the footsteps of engineering pioneers with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins for Better Future (Dirigible) and Geo Corp (Locomotive) corporations.

name: Temple Escape
summary: A simple and fun arcade game in which you can become a real adventurer, escaping from mortal danger. Aid your explorer and help him escape the ancient temple!

name: Temple of Spider
summary: Huge level for exploration and intense fighting.

name: Tecmo Super NBA Basketball
summary: Tecmo Super NBA features real teams (all 27 contemporary teams) and a roster of real players (over 320). One or two players can compete in regular, reduced, or short seasons, or play an exhibition game. Though primarily horizontal scrolling, digitized speech and cinemas, along with a free throw point of view, add drama to the proceedings. Besides the expected elements of basketball (substitutions, penalties, steals and blocks, time-outs, overtime), Super NBA gives you the chance to call offensive plays and to program win/loss records. Has a battery to back-up season play.

name: Tetsujin 28-Gou
summary: A game set in the Tetsujin/Gigantor universe where you control gigantic robots with a remote control.

name: Temporal War
summary:
In 2027, on parallel Earth 103. The Red Army implemented a full blockade on the Tech Island to obtain control of chip technology and global dominance.
To counter the Red Army, the Tech Island allies formed the Blue Army, sparking intense warfare on the island and its surrounding waters...

name: Tenchi no Mon 2: Busouden
summary: Tenchi no Mon 2: Busouden is the prequel to Kingdom of Paradise. The game featured an all new cast of charaters and new lands to explore, but unfortunately was never released outside of Japan.

name: Teigeki Graph in Sakura Wars
summary: A companion to Sakura Wars 2 that features a short scenario about the Hanagumi's production of the Sleeping Beauty and other bonus materials.

name: Tecmo Secret of the Stars
summary: In this game you wander around the world map. visiting towns and dungeons, and fighting monsters in turn-based combat viewed from first-person perspective, much like in Dragon Quest games. You'll have two parties at your disposal, and will be able to switch between them at any time. One party is the Aquitallion, the "main" one, and the only one which can access plot-progressing areas. The other parties can be used for visiting dungeons and retrieving valuable items. At a certain point in the game, you'll also be able to build and to manage your own town.

name: Tetris
summary: An unofficial port of Tetris for the Arcadia 2001.

name: Tennis Tune-Up
summary: Say What You See! Voice Commands!Tennis Tune-Up: Target Practice is the first step in a real world simulation of tennis action with voice commands. Real world physics and your voice commands take you to a fun practice area. Select from easy targets or hard to hit targets to practice your ball placement and spin.

name: Tekken 7: Frame Data Display
summary: An add-on for Tekken 7 that grants use of the expanded "Frame Data Display" feature.

name: Test Drive III: The Passion
summary: After you choose a car, you have to drive as fast as possible without crash and without getting caught by the cops. You are equipped with the radar detector so you are informed about the approaching trouble. Third version of the favorite racing game.

name: Team Fortress 2: The Second Annu-Hell Scream Fortress Hauntdead Halloween Special
summary: The Second Annu-Hell Scream Fortress Hauntdead Halloween Special, then also commonly known as the Scream Fortress Update, Following the previous year's Haunted Halloween Special, the celebration established the annual Team Fortress 2 Halloween event.

name: Teeth of Glass
summary:
It begins with one cut.

You play as Doctor Joshua Hagstrom, as he finds himself trapped in an otherworldly fever dream. Just who is the mysterious patient? How can Dr Hagstrom escape? And will he live to see his family again?

Teeth of Glass is a short point & click horror fever dream, with two different endings.

name: Tenka Touitsu
summary: Tenka Touitsu is a strategy game set in feudal Japan.

name: Teahouse of Souls
summary: Teahouse of Souls is a VR game that grows the seeds of emotions in a fairytale-like space and comforts the soul by making tea with harvested crops.

name: Text: Russia
summary: Want to learn how to type on the keyboard at the speed of light? Then this simulator is for you! Choose 1 of 9 game types and train your typing skills!

name: Teenage Wasteland
summary: Teenage Wasteland is a hugely detailed, open world RPG set in the early 2000's! With over a hundred perks, dozens of cliques to help/harass, and hundreds of choices, you can be the teen YOU want to be...

name: Temple of ROM
summary: Star Blaze is a new adventure in space exploration for your TRS-80 Color Computer. As the commander of a patrol ship, you are responsible for defending the 64 sectors of your galaxy. Aliens are attacking the galaxy, trying to destroy the fuel and repair stations set up in several sectors. You must hunt down the aliens and destroy them before they ruin the galaxy's supply stations. Your patrol ship, superior in speed, maneuverability, and attack power, is your best ally in the fight against the aliens

name: Terminal squad: Swarmites
summary: Terminal squad: swarmites is a game with indirect control where you must erect a chain of buildings, which generate resources for construction or the combat units for destruction of an enemy.

name: Test: The Game
summary: A project created by midosei, who states that it was going to be something small and short, but it ended taking up three years to make. The whole project is made with default assets from RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Technofumer
summary: FPS Action Arcade Game.

name: Tensai Bit-Kun: Gramon Battle
summary: Tensai Bit-Kun: Gramon Battle is a tactical role-playing video game released in 2003 only in Japan.

name: Team Innocent: The Point of No Return
summary: Team Innocent: The Point of No Return is an adventure game with action elements. The game consists of three missions. The player controls Saki most of the time, but other girls temporarily become available as playable characters as well. The heroine must explore a large location, collecting items and solving a few puzzles on the way. The young women can also find and equip various weapons, from pistols to axes. The player can choose one of the four action modes: punching, kicking, shooting, and (in specific instances only) jumping. The girls are navigated from third-person perspective on pre-rendered backgrounds with constantly changing camera angles, similarly to Alone in the Dark games, except for the protagonists being sprites and not 3D models. The game has a few anime-style cutscenes and voice-overs for dialogues.

name: Termina
summary: Termina is an intense, adrenaline-fueled, survival shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Dive into the heart-pounding action of endless waves of the undead, scavenging for power-ups, unlocking powerful weapons, and battling through hordes of relentless zombies until your last breath.

name: Tempo
summary: Splash Damage joins the mobile world with a reflex-based action game.

name: Tenno
summary: Dive into the captivating world of "Tenno", where the art of the ninja takes center stage. Craft your very own ninja, molding their appearance and abilities to match your vision.

name: Terraformers & Moonshine Inc.: Mars and Moon Bundle
summary: Explore Mars or make Moonshine, it's your choice - two games in one package!

name: Tenant
summary: Tenant is a space dogfighting game in which you can invade and use the enemy ships to your advantage. Each spaceship has an unique ability that can be useful in different combat situations.

name: Tengutana
summary:
Tengutana is a virtual reality puzzle game.
The player needs to have a sharp eye and good aim as he will have to swing with katana and throw shurikens to solve the tasks at hand.

name: Tennis Girl
summary: The player is about to enter a girl's tennis academy, where the students are all beautiful, and extremely talented tennis girls. Outsiders call them "tennis girls". Player need to conquer these girls with you tennis skills!

name: Tekken 7: Fahkumram
summary: An add-on for Tekken 7 that grants use of the character "Fahkumram".

name: Terezi Pyrope: Ace Attorney
summary: Tavros is accused of Murder by an old FLARPing buddy in a Court-Only Tutorial case.

name: Tear Ring Saga
summary: Tear Ring Saga is a tactical RPG with gameplay very similar to the gameplay found in the Fire Emblem series of video games. The player is tasked with certain objectives, commonly fighting and defeating an entire opposing faction, or a particular member or leader of a faction.

name: Teudogar and the Alliance with Rome
summary:
Teudogar is a RPG set in Rome during the time of emperor Augustus. You are playing a member of a Teutonic city named Teudogar and your tribe is faced with the question whether to arrange a alliance with Rome or to unify the Teutonic tribes to fight them. 
 
The main feature of this game is the historical accuracy. Every aspect of the game world is researched to align with the historical facts. There is even a whole encyclopedia included. Otherwise it is a RPG in the style of Ultima VII: You explore the world in a isometric perspective, talk to a lot of people and solve quests. You have a lot of freedom what to do and what not do do - you can explore the world or concentrate on the plot. 
 
Combat is complete turn based but if you are wounded your combat abilities start to decrease dramatically. The character system is based on "learning by doing" - if you use a certain weapon you get better in using it. There are no experiment points. The interface and the movement are completely mouse-controlled.

name: Tecmo Knight
summary:
The protagonist Tecmo Knight has the assistance of "Smokeman" and "Tiger". Pressing the "change" button allows Tecmo Knight to switch between the two. Smokeman uses powerful punches and kicks against enemies while Tecmo Knight rides him. While riding the tiger, Tecmo Knight has the use of a spiked ball and chain less powerful than Smokeman's attacks, but with greater range. When collecting the special dragon skull that randomly appears after defeating an enemy, the Tecmo Knight will summon the most powerful creature to ride on in the game: the Flying Dragon. Tecmo Knight is immune to attack while riding Flying Dragon, whose breath kills any monster in the game instantly, including the stage-end bosses. Using the "jump and attack" maneuver, Tecmo Knight can bound Smokeman or the tiger onto enemies and pummel them.

Sometimes, if Tecmo Knight runs low on life, a blow by a weak monster will kill only Smokeman or the tiger, leaving Tecmo Knight to fend for himself with a very weak short-ranged attack. It is extremely hard for him to survive at this point. All bosses in the game appear in "pairs" making it harder for a single player to corner them. The only exception is the last boss. Currently, there are two "extra life" bonus skulls known to exist in the game. Players can also utilize "props" like bombs and stone-rollers placed around the map to their advantage.

Much like the 1988 arcade beat 'em up Ninja Gaiden, Tecmo Knight is hard for beginners, because it requires more patience than button-pounding. Like Ninja Gaiden, the game features a rather disturbing continue screen, where Tecmo Knight is about to be swallowed by an unseen monster. If the player does not continue before the 10 second countdown ends, Tecmo Knight is heard screaming as the monster swallows him. Afterwards, the screen will black out, and a monster will tear through the screen shouting "NO FUTURE!", along with "Game Over" appearing under the monster.

name: Tengai Makyou: Dennou Karakuri Kakutou-den
summary: Tengai Makyou: Dennou Karakuri Kakutouden is a fighting game and the sixth game in the Tengai Makyou series.

name: Telluria: Forebodings
summary: A 3D graphic adventure with parallel realities, ancient vestiges and dark omens. Play in two worlds and through two ages. Discover the past to shape the future. The fate of Telluria will rest on you.

name: Terminal Hacker
summary: Welcome to Terminal Hacker, you must crack as many passwords as you can before you get locked out of the terminal. Terminal Hacker features 3 different gamemodes with four difficulties, and leaderboards.

name: Teocida + Estigma
summary: Enter the surrealistic horror world of Teocida+Estigma!

name: Tentacles
summary: Tear up another creature's insides in this WP7 release.

name: Tekken Hybrid
summary: Tekken Hybrid is a bundle collection of Tekken: Blood Vengeance 3D with an HD version of Tekken Tag Tournament and a demo version of Tekken Tag Tournament 2 called Tekken Tag Tournament 2 Prologue. It was officially announced at E3 2011. This collection was released exclusively on PlayStation 3.

name: Terrahawks
summary: After being sucked into a balck hole you have to avoid monoliths in your flight path.

name: Telephone Trouble
summary: A Paper's Please/Cook Serve Delicious like switch board management game. Connect as many calls as you can!

name: Terra Nil: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Terra Nil Deluxe Edition bundle includes a soothing 34-track OST by Meydän and a beautifully illustrated Digital Artbook.

name: Team Fortress 2: Meet Your Match
summary: The Meet Your Match Update was a major update that saw the official release of Competitive Mode matchmaking and PASS Time, introduced Casual Mode matchmaking, four new maps, eight new cosmetic Items, an all class weapon, four new taunts, two achievements, and two startup themes.

name: TerRover
summary: Pilot a Moon Patrol-like space buggy in this downloadable release from Sony Online Entertainment.

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Real Pro Tokkyuu Romance Car! Odakyu Dentetsu-hen
Tetraminos
summary: The classic arcade game is back in a supercharged version! Discover timeless gameplay revamped, practise in Puzzle mode and challenge your friends in local Versus mode with up to 4 players!

name: Tenchu Kurenai Portable
summary: Tenchu Kurenai Portable is a PSP port of the PS2 title Tenchu: Fatal Shadows, exclusive to Japan.

name: Temperature Adjustment Log #1587325
summary:
The walks are longer, now, than they used to be.

Year 3402 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: Temple of the Winds
summary:
One-region exploration/puzzle hack focusing on using new items to overcome challenges.

Temple of the Winds
a Super Metroid hack by Moehr and Albert V.

This is the first hack of 'A Hunter Born' series

name: Terranean
summary: An arcade sci-fi shoot-'em-up by Data Est, where a lone ship must defend the planet Terra from alien forces.

name: Tekken 8: Clive Rosfield
summary:
Clive Rosfield, the first prince of the Grand Duchy of Rosaria, from FINAL FANTASY XVI joins the tournament!

Experience thrilling swordplay and precision coordinated attacks with Clive's loyal hound, Torgal. Wield powerful and dynamic Eikonic abilities and temporarily transform into the mighty Ifrit. Use your power as the Dominant of Fire to emerge victorious.

Content:
- Clive Rosfield as a playable character

name: Test Drive 6
summary: Test Drive 6 is a cross-platform racing video game developed by Pitbull Syndicate for the PlayStation, Game Boy Color, Microsoft Windows and Dreamcast. It is the sixth entry in the Test Drive series.

name: Teki Paki
summary: A falling block puzzle game, Teki-Paki is based around creating strings of 5 or more blocks vertically, horizontally or diagonally. The player drops L-Shaped 3-block pieces onto the game field. If the screen is filled, the game is over.

name: Teen Titans 2
summary: Teen Titans 2 (alternatively known as Teen Titans 2: The Brotherhood's Revenge on the title screen) is a Game Boy Advance game released in 2006, one year after the previous Teen Titans Game Boy Advance game and the same year as the Teen Titans video game for the PlayStation 2, Xbox, and Nintendo GameCube.

name: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
summary: The first Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann mobile game is here! Produced by TRIGGER, this faithful adaptation will bring you back to the good old days of a drill's romance. Join forces with Team Gurren for an epic journey. The sky is the limit!

name: Tempus Denique
summary: Time. It all boils down to time

name: Team Fortress 2 Vintage
summary: Team Fortress 2 Vintage is a Source 2013 modification based off of Team Fortress 2 Classic as a re-imagining of retail TF2, focusing on being a museum to the game.

name: Teacher of prophecy
summary: This is a very interesting simulation business game.

name: Tentlan
summary: Step into the shoes of a maya emperor in this new take on the classic idle empire building genre! Start your settlement in the heart of the rainforest and develop ancient rituals and research, recruit powerful eagle and jaguar warriors, raid barbarian settlements, deal with friendly and hostile tribes and more!

name: Teleportia
summary: Master instant teleportation, conquer puzzles, and navigate through intricate levels in this captivating puzzle game. Sharpen your skills and embark on an exhilarating journey of clever problem-solving. Can you conquer Teleportia?

name: Tengai ni Mau, Iki na Hana
summary: Otome visual novel developed by Ichicolumn Inc. for PS Vita.

name: Tennis Elbow
summary:
The first release in this tennis series allows players to compete in a World Tour of 90 events against 250 players. Single matches can be dirty up and dirty down (two against one) as well as the more conventional singles and doubles. Grass, clay, flexi and cement courts are featured. Action replays can be viewed in slow motion, fast speed, and rewound.
Players can be defined as volleyers, defenders, punchers or varied, with definable kit colours and playing abilities. As you play the game, your player's ability improves, resulting in faster and more accurate serves as well as faster running and bigger jumps.
Tennis Elbow 2004 is an enhanced Windows port of the original Tennis Elbow.

name: Tenshitsuki no Shoujo
summary: A Daidadi Inc developed Japan exclusive role playing game for the PS Vita and iOS.

name: Terraformers + Tin Can: To Infinity, and Beyond Bundle!
summary: Get two space games in one pack! Terraformers and Tin Can!

name: Tearstone: Thieves of the Heart
summary: The Heart of Tearstone has gone missing! Climb aboard and hold on tight for a challenging and enchanting Puzzle Adventure game for the ages!

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Sweat & Tears
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Sweat & Tears is a release in the Prince of Tennis video game series.

name: Texas Hold 'em
summary: Texas Hold 'em is an Xbox Live Arcade version of the popular poker variant of the same name developed by TikGames.

name: Test Drive Off-Road Wide Open
summary: Test Drive Off-Road ? Wide Open gives you brute force off-road racing through nature's untamed badlands. Twelve kick-ass trucks fight for off-road supremacy in the wide open wilderness. Prove your skills in a Hummer, Dodge T-Rex, Ford Bronco, and more. Take towering jumps at high speeds in your unstoppable trucks. Grab your guts and hold on, because this one gets rough!

name: Test Drive II: Scenery Disk - European Challenge
summary: This addon for Test Drive II features a race through Europe. Racing through the stages you cross following countries: The Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, France and Spain.

name: Test Drive II: Car Disk - The Supercars
summary: This addon for Test Drive II features 5 new cars which you can use to race the tracks. The cars include: '88 Lotus Turbo Esprit, Ferrari Testarossa, RUF CTR, '88 Lamborghini Countach 5000S and a '89 Corvette ZR1. As for every addon the main program is needed to enjoy the new cars.

name: Team Fortress 2: End of the Line Update
summary: The End of the Line Update was a major community-created update. It brought one new multi-class weapon, 23 new cosmetics, a new Pyro taunt, as well as a collection of items for leaderboard tracking.

name: Testament
summary: Testament is a horror-themed Doom clone, set outside and inside graveyards, catacombs and dungeons filled with ancient fantasy monsters. On each level you will find a scroll, a piece of the "testament" of the title. This will allow you to save your progress and move on to the next level.

name: Tennis Elbow 2009
summary: The 2009 version of the long-run Mana Games tennis franchise.

name: Terranigma
summary: Terranigma is an action role-playing game for the SNES. It is one of the few games which has never been released in North America. The Game is about a boy named Ark whose fate is to resurrect the earth and to contribute to the evolution of life.

name: Text Express: Word Adventure
summary: Play Text Express: Word Adventure - a new genre defining game that combines word search puzzles, interactive stories and epic adventures! Join Tilly, a brave and smart young woman, as she travels in her old train to majestic destinations, meets new friends and unlocks her true destiny. Discover how the words you find impact the story!

name: Tekken 7: Ultimate Edition
summary: This edition includes the full game, all additional content eligible to Season Passes 1 & 2, the playable character Eliza, the Taiko no Tatsujin Pack, and the Artist Collaboration Character Panel Set.

name: Tempest of the Heavens and Earth
summary:
An Ecstatic-class Stylish 2D Action Game controlling Tenshi Hinanawi, as she runs all around the realms of Gensokyo! You are the path of righteousness itself!

This is a derivative game inspired by the Touhou Project universe.
The publisher of this game on Steam is DLsite Official.

name: Teamball.io
summary: Teamball.io is a 2D physics-based multiplayer soccer io game, playable in browser and on mobile as well. You can play in team/solo leagues or host friendly custom games with others.

name: Terraria: Mod of Redemption
summary: Mod of Redemption, the remastered version of the now discontinued Mod of Randomness, is a large-scale content mod that adds a wide variety of content into Terraria at all points of the game. This includes many challenging bosses, the new Druid class, the mysterious Abandoned Lab dungeon, and much more!

name: Tech Clash
summary: In the far future huge companies compete for the control of the technological market, in this mayhem the CEOs of the biggest companies reunite and decide to fight it off in a tournament! Each company will provide a champion in what would be the fight of the century!

name: Teddy The Wanderer: Mountain Hike
summary: Teddy The Adventurer brings joy to every youngling, as well as brings educational value.

name: Tetrius
summary: About TETRIUS from Wikipedia: "Tetris is a computer game originally invented and developed by the Soviet programmer Alexei Pajitnov. The game was released on June 6, 1984 - at that time Pajitnov worked at the Computing Center of the USSR Academy of Sciences."

name: Tenchu: Wrath of Heaven
summary:
Move like a shadow. Strike like a snake.

After amassing an army of ninjas and lords of darkness, the mysterious Tenrai has begun a quest to conquer 16th-century Japan. Now your master, Lord Gohda, has called upon you - a cunning stealth assassin - to stop Tenrai and his disciples before all is lost.

Live by honor. Kill by stealth.

name: Territory Idle
summary: Strategic idle game. Develop the kingdom, then abdicate and get gold! For gold, you can buy new tiles and expand the territory.

name: Terra Trilogy
summary:
Terra Trilogy features three full games in one package that pay homage to the classic and retro arcade genre of the 1980s. While capturing the twitch gameplay of their predecessors, they're brought to you in glorious HD using vector graphics to provide clean, never pixelated graphics and advanced Newtonian physics.
Terra Lander, Terra Lander II – Rockslide Rescue, and Terra Bomber each offer the familiar boops and beeps that will inspire fond memories in veteran players while newcomers will appreciate the improved graphics, visual effects, and controls they come to expect from current-gen games.

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Sweat & Tears 2
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Sweat & Tears 2 is a Sports game, developed by Tenky and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Tempest
summary: Atari 2600 port of Tempest. It was previously unreleased.

name: Teddy Floppy Ear: The Race
summary: People of Animalville got a carting fever and you must help one of them reach for the championship. Take the wheel, choose a kart, decide which character from "Teddy Floppy Ear" universe you want, and start the wild ride!

name: TetrotronVR
summary: Nothing can be better than well overlooked old, but in new format! TetrotronVR is completely new look at the usual. Being on the surface of Mars and have limited time you will need to fill the gaps in the wall, with the help of familiar figures in the form of square, line, letters "L" and "Z".

name: Terminal Stages of Nostalgia
summary: A moderate-to-large single map for vanilla Doom II.

name: Tetrastar: The Fighter
summary: Tetrastar The Fighter is a 3D shooter by Home Data and published by Taito. In the year 2089, humanity forms an alliance with the intergalactic Baal empire but soon Earth finds out about the alien's true intentions. A group of resistance assembles the project Tetrastar to prepare for the potential upcoming threat. But the project lead by the general Nelson is soon put on hold and a short lived peace settles in. But the whole thing was nothing more than a hostile invasion and the Baal empire finally breaks the alliance and attacks Earth. The player's first mission is to prevent New York to be destroyed and then to retrieve Omega, the faithful robot navigator, to warp to the alien's mother world. The Tetrastar super fighter can move around the screen and fire a standard Vulcan gun. Special weapons become available later in the game from Bombs (WID), Homing Missiles (AAM), Napalm Bombs (NAP) and the powerful Bio Cannon (BIO) - they are accessible via the Select button and triggered by pressing A. They all come in limited quantities and must be refilled by picking up power-pods along the way. Tetrastar features nice stages and cutscenes between them unfold the game's episodic story.

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Kikansha Thomas-hen - Ooigawa Tetsudou wo Hashirou!
summary:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

This game was localized and released in the west by the title "Japanese Rail Sim 3D: Travel of Steam", but, unique to its original Japanese release, is the inclusion of elements from the TV show " Thomas the Tank Engine", which Oigawa Railway was collaborating with. As expected, by choosing to play on this mode, you can drive as Thomas, the main character of the show.

In this entry, the focus is turned around steam locomotives. You can drive the C11 No. 190 steam locomotive, the first one in this series, through a 39.5 km trip from Kanaya Station to Senzu Station on Oigawa Railway's Oigawa Main Line.

name: Techno Drive
summary: Techno Drive is an arcade driving game that focuses on technical driving skills rather than speed. Players are tasked with completing a series of driving challenges designed to test precision, control, and reaction time. The game is notable for its futuristic, minimalist visual style with flat-shaded polygons and a techno soundtrack that complements its high-tech theme.

name: Terminal Breach
summary: Terminal Breach is an action rogue-lite twin stick shooter where you gun down countless waves of creatures, choose upgrades to create powerful and unique synergies and unlock a variety of characters, weapons and levels.

name: Tennis 2024 Simulator
summary: Are you ready to conquer the Grand Slam titles and become a tennis legend?

name: Telebradesco Residência
summary: Telebradesco Residência was a home banking cartridge that provided access to Banco Bradesco bank account information directly from your Mega Drive. The cartridge cost around 13-14 reais for pre-existing accounts or given for free to new ones and had a 3,95 monthly fee to access the service.

name: Tender: Creature Comforts
summary: Tender is a narrative game that explores connection and rejection in the era of swipe culture. It's a story told by and through the modern interface for finding love.

name: Temptation
summary: Temptation - a game about a medieval priest who is suddenly possessed by a demon. Your goal is to perform an unusual ritual of exorcism to banish the demon from himself!

name: TermoVerse Chronicles
summary: A fan-made game dedicated to I Termosifoni.

name: Tesla's Best Friend
summary: This game is the third game in The Magnificent Fragments collection. This time, story fragments are interesting facts from the life of Nikola Tesla, narrated as if they were witnessed by Tesla's fictional best friend.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo III: Ribbon
summary:
The third game in the Tenshitachi no Gogo series is not connected to its predecessors story-wise. In this installment, the player assumes the role of a male teacher in a high school. Many pretty female students (and pretty female teachers) surround the hero, but he only has one girl in mind: Haru Okamoto, whom he calls "his angel". In order to win her love, the hero will have to know her better - which also means knowing the secrets of students and teachers alike...

Tenshitachi no Gogo 3: Ribbon is a Japanese-style (puzzle-less) adventure game. The player interacts with the environment by choosing verb commands ("Look", "Ask", "Search", etc.), which lead to sub-menus with object choices. The game mostly advances in a linear way, but at certain points the story can end prematurely, depending on the player's choice.

name: Test your knowledge: Dogs
summary: Is a test game that will test your knowledge of different breeds of dogs. Do you know what a variety of dog breeds look like? German shepherd, Labrador Retriever, English bulldog, Poodle, Golden Retriever, Chihuahua, and many others. Test yourself with our interesting test

name: TerraTech: To the Stars Pack
summary: Relive Roswell with Better Future and enter the Space Race as GSO, with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins.

name: Terraformers + Starward Rogue: Mechs and Colonizers Bundle
summary: Colonize Red Planet or fight in a mech - Mechs and Colonizers Bundle!

name: Temporis Arts
summary: Temporis Arts is Pretty Maniac Rhythm game with a circularly rotating Judgement Line! What you have to do in a spinning, sounding world is just - hit the notes in Tempo!

name: Tempest Tower
summary: Protect your tower from invading Creepers using wild contraptions, powerful upgrades, or maybe just... jump on their heads! Tempest Tower reinvents Tower Defense with a thrilling mix of strategic base-building and engaging player-driven combat! Can you withstand the onslaught and save Trip Space?

name: TekSkeleton
summary: TekSkeleton is a hardcore platformer of the Tek line. Run, jump, kill enemies, and avoid obstacles through 5 hand-crafted levels, enjoy the atmospheric retro graphics in the dungeon style.

name: Telejogo II
summary: Telejogo II is the sequel to the dedicated Pong clone home video game console made by the Brazilian subsidiary of Philco-Ford in 1979, now including ten games in the memory.

name: Terrorhythm
summary: TERRORhythm - the music powered beat 'em up game. Follow the rhythm of music to defeat the security systems that keep any sound from the society. You are here to challenge and break the total muted control system. You are the TERRORhythm!

name: Tentacuddle
summary: Tentacles have you surrounded! In this score-attack action rogue-lite, sacrifice is the key to reinforcing your power. Set the difficulty of the game and use your Ooze to battle slithering hordes. Maintain your sanity and slither your way to victory!

name: Telocation: Gemini
summary: Telocation: Gemini (sometimes just Telocation) is a Nintendo 64 homebrew game by the Ultra Rare team and released on 13 December 2020. In it, you control a crashlanded space cadet that befriends a robot and who work together to gather gems and escape the planet. This game was made for the 64brew game jam 2020, and won 1st place.

name: Tears Rain: Tears of Goddess
summary: Tears Rain is a combination of TCG and roguelike, and tells the story of characters who set foot in the Forest of Illusions. Use the given cards, weapons, and items strategically to defeat the enemies that stand in your way.

name: Tenet
summary: Tenet is a fast-paced shooter where you are trapped underworld in a nightmarish arena, and the only key to survival is to stay within the light. Your skills will be put to the test as you blast, punch, and stomp your way through this gore infused gauntlet as you tear your foes limb to limb.

name: TextSpaced
summary: TextSpaced is a text-based sci-fi MMORPG played in your browser, where as a captain you attempt to survive and prosper in an infinite and hostile universe. TextSpaced blends the style of more traditional text adventures with modern principles to create a game where everyone coexists in the same expansive universe which is steeped in lore and intrigue. The entire universe is organic where everything is connected to everything else, every decision you make has a cascade of repercussions for you and your faction. The sandbox nature of the game leaves you, the player, the freedom to decide at any point what to do next.

name: Tender Frame Cocoon: //Rhapsody of Cross-Pollination
summary:
Deidamia Leonte has crash-landed on a desert planet... alongside the leader of the warring faction's elite cell.

The newest chapter in the long-running TENDER FRAME franchise is here.

name: Temple of the Lost
summary: Explore the Temple of the Lost, solve occasional puzzles, avoid deadly traps, beat the mazes and find what's hidden. Slowly uncover the secrets of this temple, while listening to ambient, atmospheric music.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Four for Four
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Four for Four is a 1992 handheld LCD video game released by Konami. The United Kingdom release was re-branded Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles: Four for Four and revised the game's sticker artwork.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Dimension X Assault
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Dimension X Assault is a stand-alone handheld video game developed by Tiger Electronics, and released in 1995. It is the only video game to utilize any content from the Red Sky episodes of the 1987 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles series. The character artwork on the packaging and label is by Ken Mitchroney and Chris Allan, artists on Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Adventures.

name: Tetram
summary: TETRAM is a blend of mechanics reminiscent of classic block games with card memorization and spatial location. It's an innovative mechanic for those who enjoy games with similar gameplay.

name: Tempo Jr.
summary: Music can be fun! Tempo, the hip-hoppin' grasshopper lives in the musical world of planet Rhythmia. It's up to Tempo to save the rhythm and give King Dirge the blues! Tempo boogies, spins, snaps his fingers and slings notes to zap King Dirge's tune-swiping ants.

name: Tenhou
summary: Tenhou is a japanese online mahjong service.

name: Ten trials of Archer
summary:
Shooting the target using a bow and arrow!
Draw your bow, take aim and release your finger in the most immersive archery experience.
Just touch the screen to load a bolt in your weapon. Glide your fingers across the touchscreen just as you would control a real bow and arrow with your hands.
It is a very simple but very fun game! Great for intense matches with friends! Set up some targets and face off in competition.
This game provides a nice picture, sweet sound and beautiful music. This is a short and sturdy game, 5 minutes will make your own satisfaction, and every play, can have a new experience.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo Collection
summary:
"Tenshi-tachi no Gogo Collection" contains three games, which are remakes of the first three entries in the Tenshi-tachi no Gogo series.
The remade versions were not released separately.

All the three games have updated graphics (some scenes were completely re-drawn), as well as interface changes. There is no text input and all the three remakes have a similar verb-based menu interface. The menus have been simplified, with less choices than in the original versions, removing most of the "useless" command combinations.

name: Tekken Tag Tournament HD
summary: In this, the fourth Tekken game in the series, and the first for the Playstation 2, you can duel it out with all your favourite characters from past Tekken games with the new tag feature (as the title suggests). You simply choose two characters to battle with, and during the fight you can swap the characters on screen.

name: Tekken Tag Tournament
summary: Tekken Tag Tournament is an update of Tekken 3 and is the fourth installment in the popular Tekken fighting game series. It is not canonical to the Tekken storyline however.

name: Tempus Bound
summary: Tempus Bound is an artistically-driven pixel platformer with physics, puzzles and a speed running mode. In a desolate world, you play as a mysterious bushbaby/owl/fox hybrid with a dark past. Scramble across the world of wind temples & swamplands to reach your ultimate destination.

name: Terminus: Survival
summary: Terminus: Survival is a sandbox survival game set in the depths of space. Explore, build a base and survive against the hostile environment.

name: Tearing Spaces
summary: Tearing Spaces is a competitive NFT game where players battle it out to earn tokens and rewards. Players battle in teams of 3v3 against real players from around the world.

name: Technophobia: Dead Metal Tournament
summary: Robots smash each other to pieces in one on one hand to hand combat to prove they are not junk. 1 or 2 player 3d fighting game that is 2d in principle Use carefully timed directional and button inputs to execute moves and combos.

name: Tesla Breaks the World!
summary: Classic 2D platforming that blends elements of: Nikola Tesla, puzzles, inventions, 1800's-era undead and a sprinkling of the maniacal Thomas Edison. Throw in a dash of randomly generating level sectors, a zesty squeeze of items and a pinch of indie love... Tasty!

name: Terrorfest
summary: Terror Fest is the first and thus far only book of the Terror Fest series.

name: Tekken X Street Fighter
summary:
A crossover game that is planned to have Street Fighter characters in the 3D fighting style of a normal Tekken game.
The reverse of Street Fighter x Tekken which put Tekken characters into the 2D fighting style of a Street Fighter game in 2012.

The game has been stuck in development since its 2010 announcement and the game was put on hold officially in 2016, though early character models and some gameplay systems were said to be finished at the time.

name: Tekken 2
summary: Tekken 2 is a port of the 1995 fighting game made for mobile devices and the Zeebo.

name: Terrible Neighbor House
summary: Your neighbor become suspicious & scary, sneak into neighbors house & find out

name: Terrifying 9/11
summary: Terrifying 9/11 is a Game Boy Color game released some time after the 9/11 attacks by Hitek in Taiwan. The game is an unlicensed port of Metal Slug 1.

name: Teratale: Tide of Wishes
summary: Travel with your mysterious partner Tupa, fight powerful monsters, discover treasures and secrets scattered around the world, and uncover the truth of the world, Tupa and yourself with the help of the tide of wishes.

name: Temple of Endless Night
summary: When you discover that the Serpent of Chaos is trying to destroy Egypt, will you stand against him, or will you help spread his eternal darkness?

name: Templar Castle Builder
summary: Besiege and conquer the castles and towns of your enemies. Build siege machines and train your army to assault the fortified cities but do not neglect your defence system. Change the course of history, and do not let the Templar Order fall.

name: Technoccult: Covenant
summary: Technoccult: Covenant is a short form interactive fiction game inspired by PC-98 era visual novels, the Shin Megami Tensei franchise, and psychopunk classics like Boogiepop Phantom and Serial Experiments Lain. Can you find all three endings?

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: 2005 Crystal Drive
summary: An action-packed tennis game based on the Prince of Tennis series filled with crazy moves and super powers.

name: Tempter
summary: "Tempter" is a suspenseful first-person horror game that shows how humans can be even more dangerous than demons when they gain power. It centers on the struggle to save one's soul against a demon after breaking a pact.

name: Tears of Metal
summary: Tears of Metal is a medieval hack-and-slash co-op roguelike. Carve through hordes of enemies to reclaim your island with the help of your formidable Scottish battalion. As you advance deeper into the trenches, uncover more about the mysterious Dragon Meteor and the treacherous enemy invasion.

name: Teahouse of the Gods
summary: The job offers a six-figure salary, pensions, and competitive benefits. Its description? You’ll run a teahouse on Mount Qingcheng in Sichuan, China. The job description didn’t mention reincarnation, gods, spirits, or the end of the universe.

name: Terra Force
summary: A shooter from the same company who brought you Terra Cresta.

name: Technician Ted
summary: You have 8,5 hours to complete all 21 tasks Ted has to accomplish during his work day. It's up to you to figure what these are and in what order you should do them...

name: TerraTech: R&D Labs
summary: R&D Labs is a game mode for TerraTech, which allows the player to take on a variety of unique challenges and test out a series of experimental items.

name: Tennis Cup
summary: Tennis Cup is a split-screen tennis game with the camera closely positioned at the athlete's back. The available playing modes are exhibition match (either single or double), training, the Davis Cup or the four Grand Slam tournaments. The player either controls one of the 32 available tennis athletes or creates a new one. Then there are 30 points to divide between abilities (e.g. forehand or volleys). This athlete can be saved to disk and further improved during the course of time. For exhibition matches, the opponent can be built the same way.

name: Tentacle Temptation
summary: A dangerous slime is on the loose! With its abilities you can solve novel and progressively difficult levels in order to please your harem of beautiful women. A questionable, brain-teasing hentai adventure to break into the mind.

name: Tec
summary: Tec is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. In this game, instead of the bed, Funetsuki opens her dresser/cabinet to enter the dream world. She can save using the computer in her room and has two endings.

name: Tetris: The Grand Master 3 - Terror‑Instinct
summary: This game was released in 2005. The game now runs on PC-based hardware, specifically the Taito Type X. The level system has been expanded in many forms with increasingly stricter requirements to reach the Grand Master rank. Modes include Easy, Sakura (a puzzle mode also seen in Tetris With Cardcaptor Sakura: Eternal Heart), the traditional Master mode, and Shirase (an extension of T.A. Death with even harsher speed, garbage, and levels beyond 999). It also features World and Classic Rules, the former added by Arika due to The Tetris Company's recent policy changes.

name: Terminal
summary: An Episode 2 map that's chock-full of laser-saturated, demon-munching action. This level is about 20 minutes long, so a cut version has been provided in the E2M3 slot for people who don't like long maps.

name: Ten Tales from the Record of the Adamant Gambit
summary: This anthology of ten short slice-of-life games explores life aboard a generation starship, originally made over ten days in December 2021 for the Variety Megajam.

name: Tenshi Na Konamaiki
summary: PS1 visual novel based on the anime Cheeky Angel.

name: Tekken Revolution
summary: One of the best-selling franchises of all time is now available for FREE! Jump on as one of your favorite characters and pummel your way to victory! For the first time in the franchise, level up your characters! Break through walls, break through the floor, and ultimately break your opponent.

name: Tecmo World Cup Soccer
summary: Tecmo World Cup Soccer is a simple soccer game with an overhead view. Only one mode (World Cup) is available, playable by either one player against the computer AI or two players against each other. Any of the sixteen available national teams can be selected by the player; the opponent cannot be chosen manually if controlled by the AI. The game itself allows only basic moves such as passing, shooting, and side-sliding during defense. There is no team management or strategy available, and no options for game rules and conditions.

name: Tennis
summary: A tennis game that can be picked up and played by anyone. Enjoy the game by yourself, or play against family and friends. With eight characters and six courts available, feel the excitement that tennis brings.

name: Teardown: Folkrace
summary:
You’ve been invited to compete in the local folkrace. Can you successfully diversify your business ventures into the world of demolition racing?

Folkrace is a single-player campaign expansion that introduces a ton of new vehicles and a series of destructive racing game modes against computer-controlled opponents. Test your mettle on the track against rival drivers and expand your car collection as you win championships.

name: Terror Brain: Night Out
summary: Terror Brain: Night Out is a Single-Player First-Person Action-Adventure Psychological Horror PC Game where you take on the role of university student Sarah Mitchell while she is trying to understand what happened to her after everything went dark during a night out at the local bar.

name: Telvoikai
summary: You've been tasked with collecting data on an alien planet. Choose between exploring the jungle tropics or navigating deep into the bioluminescent sea.

name: Technobabylon: Deluxe Edition
summary: The year 2087 is upon us — a future where genetic engineering is the norm, the addictive Trance has replaced almost any need for human interaction, and an omnipresent AI named Central powers the city. Its all-seeing CEL police force keeps tabs on everyone, including three people who are about to meet their maker.

name: Tecmo World Cup '94
summary: Tecmo World Cup heads back to arcades.

name: Tekken 8: Premium Collector's Edition
summary:
The Premium Collector's Edition Includes:
• TEKKEN 8
• Playable Character Year 1 Pass
• Character Costume: Gold Suit Pack
• Avatar Costume (x32)
• Avatar-Skins (x3)
• Burning chain metal plate
• Corporation stickers
• Premium Box
• Special Face-Off Steelbook
• Glossy Collectible Cards (x8)
• Leroy Smith Metal Ring with Velvet Pouch
• Arcade Token
• Exclusive Jin Electrified Figurine (25cm)

name: Tears to Tiara Gaiden: Avalon no Nazo
summary:
Similar to the previous work "Tears to Tiara: The Land of the Flower Crown", it is an "adventure + simulation RPG" that follows the fantasy world view and repeats the adventure part and the turn-based battle part to advance the story.

It is also positioned as a gaiden work, and the battle system has been changed and added according to the original story.

name: Team Disorder
summary: Team Disorder is a Sci-Fi Action-adventure Pirate 3D video game! The main character is played in either the first or the third-person options. This game includes four Open World maps with many secret levels. All maps have hundreds of Bad Actors to address.

name: Tekken 8: Genmaji Temple
summary:
Genmaji Temple, where mysterious ascetic monks train themselves in blood-soaked drills in a secluded area deep in the mountains, is now available!

The scenery changes depending on the time of day. The daytime atmosphere is solemn, the evening is filled with dancing autumn leaves, and the night is filled with falling snow.

name: TetherGeist
summary: TetherGeist is a 2D Precision Platformer about Mae, a young villager with a mysterious illness that has turned her right of passage into a treacherous journey. Join Mae in her struggle to prove herself as you make your way to a mystical temple using powers of astral projection.

name: Texas Hold'em 3D
summary:
Poker: Texas Hold'Em 3D it is a single player poker game in which the player plays against up to nine AI players.

There are over seventy AI players, each with their own playing style however there is only one player voice and it is male. There are two modes of play, standard and tournament, the initial stake can be varied, the card backs can be changed, the player can change the camera angle and there is a cheat option.

name: TechBeat Heart
summary: SCORCHING TECHBEAT ACTION! A frantic combo-based score attack shooter with roguelite elements. Make combos to earn more time. Master all weapons and defeat a raving mad machine. 100% arcade action. Online ranking. Lots of achievements. A Dual Gunstrike spin off.

name: Termite Man
summary: Termite Man is an metroidvania style platformer. Almost every asset is made by hand with love.

name: Tengai Makyou: Fuun Kabuki-den
summary: A direct spin-off to Tengai Makyou II: Manjimaru staring Kabuki Danjirou.

name: TeeDee
summary: A minimalist 2D tower defense game with 3 towers, 6 maps, and 4 monster types. Simple, fun, and perfect for quick strategy sessions!

name: Tempo Trigger
summary: Tempo Trigger is a rhythm and aiming skill game. Players can compete in the leaderboard or create something truly memorable with stream chat.

name: Terralora
summary: Terralora is a simple Rogue-lite where you traverse a shattered world to overthrow a tyrannical kingdom. Take on the role of a chaotic little knight: Skye, as you explore procedurally generated zones filled with secrets, mysteries, and many untold treasures!

name: Tea With Embalming Fluid
summary: Tea With Embalming Fluid is a short twine story about gender dysphoria, euphoria, and feeling like a stranger in your body.

name: Tenchi Muyo! Game-hen
summary: Sasami is kidnapped by a mysterious little girl with magical powers, and Tenchi and his companions must travel to rescue her, battling monsters and other creatures on the way.

name: Tennis Fighters
summary: Tennis Fighters is a whole new game genre where mixes a Tennis game & Fighting game. You will find a great tennis game with the action & effects of a fighting game. The mechanics are simple, the more points you do, the more damage you make to your opponent.

name: Test Subject
summary: An action-packed single-player FPS where you fight your way off an alien ship using fists and power-ups. Test your strength, wits, and resilience to survive and escape.

name: Tee Off
summary: One of the few golf games for the DC, with a cartoony style. Contains arcade mode, tournaments, five different courses and 15 characters (11 unlockable). Lots of different equipment (balls and clubs mostly) and even a futuristic cyber mini golf game are thrown in.

name: Test Subject
summary: Test Subject is a short visual novel created for O2A2 Game Jam 2024 with strict asset limitations, where you become a necromancer's test subject?

name: Terranova
summary: A nostalgic interactive fiction game set in the early 2000's. Chat with your friends, update your LimeJournal, and discover yourself through a rich world of storytelling, love and friendship.

name: Ted Nugent - Wild Hunting Adventure
summary: Experience the thrill of the hunt with Ted Nugent. In this beautifully detailed 3-D hunting simulation, set in Nugent's Hunting World, Ted helps you bag exotic trophy game. Armed with an array of hunting gear, you stalk the most challenging and dangerous beasts of the wilderness, such as wild boar, grizzly bear, and buffalo. Study their droppings, markings, and scrapes to track them. Then select the right weapon to take them down.

name: Tech Glitch
summary: An old school couch multiplayer game. Get your friends and compete against each other. Multiple game modes? Check. Many maps? Check. Power-Ups! Check. This old school local multiplayer game will not forgive you for any mistakes. Nothing is decided until the clocks stop ticking. You can always flip the tables and win spectacularly.

name: Teeworlds
summary: Teeworlds is a free online multiplayer game, available for all major operating systems. Battle with up to 16 players in a variety of game modes, including Team Deathmatch and Capture The Flag. You can even design your own maps!

name: Tears of Avia
summary: Tears of Avia is a turn-based tactical RPG. Play with up to 5 classes and hundreds of skills, finding the best synergy with your party and their skill loadout will mean the difference between success and failure. Run a balanced party or roll nothing but warriors, the choice is yours. With some skills being weapon bound rather than class bound, there are endless possibilities for you to experiment from.

name: Telebbit
summary: No future for mankind. Now, rabbits rule the world. A fast-paced platform game using teleporters.

name: Tempo Punk
summary: Can you survive in an addicting fusion of rhythm-driven FPS action and captivating dystopian action-packed storytelling? Fight for your life through cutting-edge graphics while the pulsating beats of electronic music get your brain synapses firing at highspeed.

name: Tekken 8: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Tekken 8
- Playable Character Year 1 Pass
- 4 additional playable characters
- Avatar Skin: Kinjin
• Character Costume: Gold Suit Pack
- 1 costume per each playable character (32 total)

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles HD
summary: This humble, fan-made remaster tries to be 100% faithful to the original, although, the first step to create it was 4 years ago, the total development time, is about 8 or 9 months (5/6 hours a day). My wish is to the full game, 100% clone, but, it still not.

name: Tetragon
summary: Tetragon is a vast mysterious universe of unique puzzles, magical mazes, and challenges! Your goal is to move the plane realities using the spinning world gravity wisely. Test your mind and guide the brave lumberjack through the scattered worlds in search of his lost son!

name: Test Lab Inc.
summary: Customize your skills and rain hell upon the endless hordes of robots. Test Lab Inc. is a fast-paced game where you'll be constantly tweaking your abilities until you become the ultimate weapon of mass destruction and crush all the puny robots that dare cross your path.

name: Tetris Dotbas
summary: Another Tetris version made with Locomotive Basic for the Amstrad CPC computers. One or two players supported.

name: Temtem: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Temtem Digital Deluxe Edition includes the game, plus:
- A collection of Deluxe Edition bonus cosmetic content (to be revealed at a later date)
- available when Temtem launches!

name: Tengoku Struggle: Strayside
summary: Rin Enma adopted daughter of King Enma–he who judges over the newly departed and ruler of the underworld–, is tasked to recapture “jailbreakers”, those who were punished to be in hell but have now escaped hell to the living world. Enlisting the help of Goemon and the others, she comes to the human world in hopes of recapturing the jailbreaks but the guys who are helping her to succeed in her mission are also punished, souls?! Not to mention a mysterious singer-songwriter wants to join in the fun?! Is he an enemy or an ally?

name: Tendrils And Plates
summary: Tendrils and Plates is an Open World Sci-Fi Space Survival Shooter RPG under development by a solo indie developer. You begin in a scout starship and learn to survive in a hostile solar system. Build your base and take on missions in space and on numerous ground locations.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Arcade Game
summary: This version includes two new levels (the first part of Scene 3 and all of Scene 6), which feature new enemy characters, including two new bosses: Tora (a dog-like "blizzard beast") and Shogun (a robotic samurai), both characters created for the game. Most of the original stages from the arcade version were extended as well and the second half of Scene 3, the parking garage stage, replaces the arcade version's end battle with Bebop and Rocksteady with a battle against the mutated fly form of Baxter Stockman.

name: Teenagent
summary: The CD version was the first game to be released on CD-ROM in Poland.

name: Terra Nil
summary: Terra Nil is an intricate environmental strategy game about transforming a barren wasteland into a thriving, balanced ecosystem. Bring life back to a lifeless world by purifying soil, cleaning oceans, planting trees, and reintroducing wildlife, then leave without a trace.
